atk-s0301a:1155_15: Evaṃ khipantiyo etā sacepi atirekasahassā honti,
atk-s0301a:1156_0: Sakkhī hi me sutaṃ etanti mayā hi sammukhā etaṃ sutaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1156_4: Tattha meti tasmiṃ me attano taruṇavipassanāsaṅkhāte nibbānagamanamagge mano nirato.
atk-s0301a:1156_7: Na me maggampi dakkhasīti yathā me bhavayoniādīsu gatamaggampi na passasi,

atk-s0301a:1170_14: Avayavādisamannāgatāpi hi tathārūpī vācā dubbhāsitāva hoti attano ca paresañca anatthāvahattā.
atk-s0301a:1170_15: Imehi pana catūhaṅgehi samannāgatā sacepi milakkhubhāsāpariyāpannā ghaṭaceṭikāgītikapariyāpannāpi hoti,
atk-s0301a:1170_17: Tathā hi maggapasse sassaṃ rakkhantiyā sīhaḷaceṭikāya sīhaḷakeneva jātijarāmaraṇayuttaṃ gītikaṃ gāyantiyā
atk-s0301a:1170_18: saddaṃ sutvā maggaṃ gacchantā saṭṭhimattā vipassakā bhikkhū arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0301a:1170_19: Tathā tisso nāma āraddhavipassako bhikkhu padumasarasamīpena gacchanto padumasare padumāni bhañjitvā –

atk-s0301a:1179_0: Imaṃ gītikaṃ sutvā paccavekkhanto saha puttehi paccekabodhiṃ patto.
atk-s0301a:1179_1: Evaṃ imehi catūhi aṅgehi samannāgatā vācā sacepi milakkhubhāsāpariyāpannā ghaṭaceṭikāgītikapariyāpannāpi hoti,
atk-s0301a:1179_3: Subhāsitattā eva ca anavajjā ca ananuvajjā ca viññūnaṃ atthatthikānaṃ atthapaṭisaraṇānaṃ,
atk-s0301a:1180_2: Na tāpayeti vippaṭisārena na tāpeyya na vibādheyya.
atk-s0301a:1180_3: Pareti parehi bhindanto nābhibhaveyya na bādheyya.
atk-s0301a:1180_4: Iti imāya gāthāya apisuṇavācāvasena bhagavantaṃ thometi.
atk-s0301a:1180_6: Yaṃ anādāyāti yaṃ vācaṃ bhāsanto paresaṃ pāpāni appiyāni pharusavacanāni anādāya atthabyañjanamadhuraṃ piyameva bhāsati,
atk-s0301a:1181_2: “saccaṃ have sādutaraṃ rasāna”nti nibbānāmatapaccayattā vā amatā.
atk-s0301a:1181_3: Esa dhammo sanantanoti yā ayaṃ saccavācā nāma,
atk-s0301a:1182_0: Tattha sacce patiṭṭhitattāva attano ca paresañca atthe patiṭṭhitā,
atk-s0301a:1182_1: atthe patiṭṭhitattā eva dhamme patiṭṭhitā hontīti veditabbā.
atk-s0301a:1182_6: yaṃ paresaṃ atthato anapetattā atthaṃ anuparodhakaraṃ,
atk-s0301a:1182_7: dhammato anapetattā dhammaṃ dhammikameva atthaṃ sādhetīti.
atk-s0301a:1183_5: Atha vā yaṃ buddho nibbānapattiyā dukkhassantakiriyāyāti dvinnaṃ nibbānadhātūnaṃ atthāya khemamaggappakāsanato khemaṃ vācaṃ bhāsati,
atk-s0301a:1183_6: sā ve vācānamuttamāti sā vācā sabbavācānaṃ seṭṭhāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0301a:1183_7: Iti imāya gāthāya mantāvacanavasena bhagavantaṃ abhitthavanto arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhapesīti. Pañcamaṃ.

atk-s0301a:1201_5: Chaddantabhavane mandākinipokkharaṇiyā tīre paccekabuddhānaṃ vasanaṭṭhāne. Kasmā?
atk-s0301a:1201_9: evamassa dasasahassacakkavāḷe devamanussānaṃ abbhantare guṇā patthaṭāva.
atk-s0301a:1201_10: Devamanussā tathāgatassa santikaṃ gantvā gandhamālādīhi pūjaṃ katvā “aggadhammaṃ paṭividdhasāvako”ti anantaraṃ theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā pūjenti.
atk-s0301a:1201_11: Santikaṃ āgatānañca nāma tathārūpā dhammakathā vā paṭisanthāro vā kātabbo hoti.
atk-s0301a:1202_2: Dhammadesanākāle pana majjhaṭṭhāne alaṅkatabuddhāsanamhi satthari nisinne dakkhiṇahatthapasse dhammasenāpati,
atk-s0301a:1202_6: Dve aggasāvakā aggadhammapaṭividdhattā ca mahallakattā ca there sagāravā theraṃ mahābrahmaṃ viya aggikkhandhaṃ
atk-s0301a:1202_7: viya āsīvisaṃ viya ca maññamānā dhurāsane nisīdantā ottappanti harāyanti.
atk-s0301a:1202_10: te idāni dhurāsane nisīdantā mama ottappanti harāyanti,
atk-s0301a:1202_12: So patirūpe kāle tathāgataṃ upasaṅkamitvā “icchāmahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0301a:1203_0: Thero senāsanaṃ saṃsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya chaddantabhavane mandākinitīraṃ gato.
atk-s0301a:1203_1: Pubbe paccekabuddhānaṃ pāricariyāya kataparicayā aṭṭhasahassā hatthināgā theraṃ disvāva “amhākaṃ puññakkhettaṃ
atk-s0301a:1203_2: āgata”nti nakhehi caṅkamanaṃ nittiṇaṃ katvā āvaraṇasākhā haritvā therassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ paṭijaggitvā
atk-s0301a:1203_6: thero bahuñātikagāmaṃ gato viya yathādhoteneva pattena gamissati,
atk-s0301a:1203_8: ekassa pana vāre patte sesehipi nappamajjitabba”nti vāraṃ ṭhapayiṃsu.
atk-s0301a:1203_9: Vārikanāgo pātova therassa mukhodakañca dantakaṭṭhañca ṭhapeti,
atk-s0301a:1204_1: Tassā pañcavīsatiyojanamatte ṭhāne sevālo vā paṇakaṃ vā natthi,
atk-s0301a:1204_3: Tato paraṃ pana kaṭippamāṇe udake aḍḍhayojanavitthataṃ sesapadumavanaṃ paṇṇāsayojanaṃ saraṃ parikkhipitvā ṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1204_19: Saṅkhepato tasmiṃ dahe khāditabbayuttakaṃ phalaṃ nāma natthīti na vattabbaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1204_20: Kusumānaṃ pupphanasamaye vāto reṇuvaṭṭiṃ uṭṭhāpetvā paduminipattesu ṭhapeti,
atk-s0301a:1204_22: Tato ādiccapākena paccitvā pakkapayoghanikā viya tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0301a:1204_28: tassa ekasmiṃ pabbe pādaghaṭakappamāṇaṃ khīraṃ hoti,
atk-s0301a:1205_1: Thero kālena kālaṃ tassa vimānadvāraṃ gacchati.
atk-s0301a:1205_2: So navasappipokkharamadhucuṇṇayuttassa nirudakapāyāsassa pattaṃ pūretvā deti.
atk-s0301a:1205_3: So kira kassapabuddhakāle vīsativassasahassāni sugandhasappinā khīrasalākaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0301a:1205_5: Evaṃ thero dvādasa vassāni vasitvā attano āyusaṅkhāraṃ olokento parikkhīṇabhāvaṃ ñatvā “kattha parinibbāyissāmī”ti cintetvā –
atk-s0301a:1205_6: “hatthināgehi maṃ dvādasa vassāni upaṭṭhahantehi dukkaraṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0301a:1205_7: satthāraṃ anujānāpetvā etesaṃyeva santike parinibbāyissāmī”ti ākāsena bhagavato santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0301a:1206_4: “ye maṃ ajānantā ‘ko esa paṇḍarasīso obhaggo gopānasivaṅko mahallako satthārā saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ karotī’ti cittaṃ padūsessanti,
atk-s0301a:1206_7: ‘dasasahassacakkavāḷe satthā viya paññāto pākaṭo mahāsāvako’ti cittaṃ pasādessanti,
atk-s0301a:1206_9: sattānaṃ apāyamaggaṃ pidahitvā saggamaggaṃ vivaranto nāmaṃ sāveti.
atk-s0301a:1207_0: Buddhānubuddhoti paṭhamaṃ satthā cattāri saccāni bujjhi,
atk-s0301a:1207_8: Imissā ca gāthāya pariyosāne parisā sannisīdi.
atk-s0301a:1207_9: Parisāya sannisinnabhāvaṃ ñatvā thero satthārā saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ katvā “parikkhīṇā me, bhante,
atk-s0301a:1208_3: idaṃ pacchimadassana”nti paridevante mahājane satthāraṃ vanditvā nikkhamitvā,
atk-s0301a:1208_8: uppannā saṅkhārā abhijjanakā nāma natthī”ti mahājanaṃ ovaditvā passantasseva mahājanassa vehāsaṃ abbhuggamma
atk-s0301a:1208_9: mandākinitīre otaritvā pokkharaṇiyaṃ nhatvā nivatthanivāsano katuttarāsaṅgo senāsanaṃ saṃsāmetvā phalasamāpattiyā
atk-s0301a:1208_11: Therassa sahaparinibbānā himavati sabbarukkhā pupphehi ca phalehi ca onatavinatā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0301a:1208_12: Vārikanāgo therassa parinibbutabhāvaṃ ajānanto pātova mukhodakadantakaṭṭhāni upaṭṭhapetvā vattaṃ katvā
atk-s0301a:1208_14: So yāva sūriyuggamanā therassa nikkhamanaṃ apassanto “kiṃ nu kho etaṃ?
atk-s0301a:1208_17: Ajja pana paṇṇasālatopi na nikkhamatī”ti kuṭidvāraṃ kampetvā olokento theraṃ nisinnakameva disvā hatthaṃ
atk-s0301a:1208_18: pasāretvā parāmasitvā assāsapassāse pariyesanto tesaṃ appavattibhāvaṃ ñatvā –
atk-s0301a:1208_19: “parinibbuto thero”ti soṇḍaṃ mukhe pakkhipitvā mahāravaṃ viravi.
atk-s0301a:1208_21: Aṭṭhanāgasahassāni sannipatitvā theraṃ jeṭṭhakanāgassa kumbhe nisīdāpetvā supupphitarukkhasākhā gahetvā
atk-s0301a:1209_4: So tathā katvā theraṃ tattha nipajjāpetvā hatthināgānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0301a:1209_5: Te kūṭāgāraṃ ukkhipitvā tiyojanasahassaṃ himavantaṃ punappunaṃ āvijjhiṃsu.
atk-s0301a:1209_6: Tesaṃ hatthato ākāsaṭṭhakā devā gahetvā sādhukīḷitaṃ kīḷiṃsu.
atk-s0301a:1209_7: Tato vassavalāhakā sītavalāhakā uṇhavalāhakā cātumahārājikā tāvatiṃsāti etenupāyena yāva brahmalokā kūṭāgāraṃ agamāsi,
atk-s0301a:1209_8: puna brahmāno devānanti anupubbena hatthināgānaṃyeva kūṭāgāraṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0301a:1209_15: Punadivase aruṇuggamanavelāyameva citakaṃ nibbāpetvā sumanamakuḷavaṇṇānaṃ dhātūnaṃ parisāvanaṃ pūretvā
atk-s0301a:1209_16: bhagavati nikkhamitvā veḷuvanavihārakoṭṭhakaṃ sampatte āharitvā satthu hatthe ṭhapayiṃsu.
atk-s0301a:1209_17: Satthā dhātuparisāvanaṃ gahetvā pathaviyā hatthaṃ pasāresi,
atk-s0301a:1209_20: Ajjāpi kira taṃ cetiyaṃ dharatiyevāti. Navamaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1215_3: So kira pubbe padumuttarakāle paṭibhānasampannaṃ sāvakaṃ disvā dānaṃ datvā patthanaṃ katvā kappasatasahassaṃ
atk-s0301a:1215_4: pāramiyo pūretvā amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle sakalajambudīpe vādakāmatāya jambusākhaṃ pariharitvā ekena paribbājakena
atk-s0301a:1215_5: saddhiṃ vādaṃ katvā vāde jayaparājayānubhāvena teneva paribbājakena saddhiṃ saṃvāsaṃ kappetvā vasamānāya
atk-s0301a:1215_6: ekissā paribbājikāya kucchimhi nibbatto vayaṃ āgamma mātito pañcavādasatāni,
atk-s0301a:1215_9: yaṃ vijjaṃ parijappitvā matānaṃ sīsaṃ aṅguliyā paharitvā –
atk-s0301a:1215_11: So anupubbena gāmanigamādīsu vicaranto pañcahi māṇavakasatehi saddhiṃ sāvatthiṃ anuppatto nagaradvāre sālāya nisīdati.
atk-s0301a:1216_0: Tadā ca nagaravāsino purebhattaṃ dānaṃ datvā pacchābhattaṃ suddhuttarāsaṅgā gandhamālādihatthā dhammassavanāya vihāraṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0301a:1216_4: Sopi saparivāro tehi saddhiṃ gantvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0301a:1216_12: Athassa bhagavā attano ānubhāvena niraye nibbattassa sīsaṃ dassetvā, “vaṅgīsa,
atk-s0301a:1216_14: So mantaṃ jappitvā aṅguliyā paharitvā “niraye”ti āha. “Sādhu, vaṅgīsa,
atk-s0301a:1216_18: So punappunaṃ mantaṃ parivattetvāpi aṅguliyā paharitvāpi nibbattaṭṭhānaṃ na passati.
atk-s0301a:1217_12: mayhaṃ mantena imaṃ mantaṃ dethāti. Amūliko, vaṅgīsa,
atk-s0301a:1217_15: Na sakkā mayhaṃ santike apabbajitassa dātunti.
atk-s0301a:1217_18: ahaṃ imassa santike pabbajitvā sippaṃ gaṇhāmi,
atk-s0301a:1217_19: tato sakalajambudīpe amhehi bahutaraṃ jānanto nāma na bhavissati.
atk-s0301a:1217_21: tāva anukkaṇṭhitvā vicarathā”ti te uyyojetvā “pabbājetha ma”nti āha.
atk-s0301a:1217_23: Thero taṃ attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ netvā pabbājesi.
atk-s0301a:1217_24: So pabbajitvā satthu santikaṃ āgamma vanditvā ṭhito “sippaṃ dethā”ti yāci. Vaṅgīsa,
atk-s0301a:1217_25: tumhe sippaṃ gaṇhantā aloṇabhojanathaṇḍilaseyyādīhi parikammaṃ katvā gaṇhatha,
atk-s0301a:1217_29: So taṃ anulomapaṭilomaṃ manasikaronto vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā anukkamena arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0301a:1218_0: Vimuttisukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedīti evaṃ arahattaṃ patvā vimuttisukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedento.
atk-s0301a:1218_2: Khandhāyatanadhātuyoti imāni khandhādīni pakāsento dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0301a:1218_3: Ye niyāmagataddasāti ye niyāmagatā ceva niyāmadassāti ca.
atk-s0301a:1218_8: Evaṃ cha abhiññāpatto eso mahāsāvakoti veditabbo.
atk-s0301a:1224_1: Vanasaṃyuttassa paṭhame kosalesu viharatīti satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā tassa janapadassa sulabhabhikkhatāya tattha gantvā viharati.
atk-s0301a:1224_5: Jano janasminti tvaṃ jano aññasmiṃ jane chandarāgaṃ vinayassu.
atk-s0301a:1224_8: Sataṃ taṃ sārayāmaseti satimantaṃ paṇḍitaṃ taṃ mayampi sārayāma,
atk-s0301a:1224_9: sataṃ vā dhammaṃ mayaṃ taṃ sārayāmāti attho.
atk-s0301a:1224_11: Mā taṃ kāmarajoti ayaṃ kāmarāgarajo taṃ mā avahari,
atk-s0301a:1224_16: Saṃvegamāpādīti devatāpi nāma maṃ evaṃ sāretīti vivekamāpanno,
atk-s0301a:1224_17: uttamavīriyaṃ vā paggayha paramavivekaṃ maggameva paṭipannoti. Paṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1226_2: so dūre bhikkhācāragāmaṃ gantvā āgato paṇṇasālāya pattacīvaraṃ paṭisāmetvā avidūre jātassaraṃ otaritvā
atk-s0301a:1226_3: gattāni utuṃ gāhāpetvā divāṭṭhānaṃ sammajjitvā tattha nīcamañcakaṃ paññāpetvā niddaṃ anokkamantova nipanno.
atk-s0301a:1226_4: Khīṇāsavassāpi hi kāyadaratho hotiyevāti tassa vinodanatthaṃ,
atk-s0301a:1226_6: Ajjhabhāsīti “ayaṃ bhikkhu satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā divā supati,
atk-s0301a:1226_7: divāsoppañca nāmetaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaṃ atthaṃ nāsetī”ti maññamānā “codessāmi na”nti cintetvā abhāsi.
atk-s0301a:1227_0: Āturassāti jarāturo rogāturo kilesāturoti tayo āturā,
atk-s0301a:1227_2: Sallaviddhassāti savisena sattisallena viya avijjāvisaviṭṭhena taṇhāsallena hadaye viddhassa.
atk-s0301a:1228_2: Kasmā pabbajitaṃ tapeti evarūpaṃ khīṇāsavaṃ divāsoppaṃ na tapati,
atk-s0301a:1228_3: tādisaṃ pana kasmā na tapessatīti? Vadati.
atk-s0301a:1228_6: baddhesu muttaṃ asitaṃ mādisaṃ khīṇāsavapabbajitaṃ kasmā divāsoppaṃ tape,
atk-s0301a:1230_2: Ovadatīti so kira migaluddako pātova bhuñjitvā “mige vadhissāmī”ti araññaṃ paviṭṭho ekaṃ rohitamigaṃ
atk-s0301a:1230_3: disvā “sattiyā naṃ paharissāmī”ti anubandhamāno therassa paṭhamasutte vuttanayeneva divāvihāraṃ nisinnassa
atk-s0301a:1230_9: Sopi “mahāpaṃsukūlikatthero kathetī”ti gāravena ṭhatvā sotuṃ āraddho.
atk-s0301a:1230_10: Athassa sotukāmataṃ janessāmīti thero aṅguṭṭhakaṃ jālāpesi.
atk-s0301a:1230_15: tattha naṃ gantvā ghātetvā yāvadicchakaṃ maṃsaṃ khāditvā sesaṃ kājenādāya gantvā puttake tosessāmī”ti evaṃ migasseva anupadaṃ dhāvati.
atk-s0301a:1230_16: Evaṃ vikkhittacittassa dhammaṃ desentaṃ theraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “ovadatī”ti.
atk-s0301a:1230_17: Ajjhabhāsīti “ayaṃ thero adāruṃ tacchanto viya akhette vappanto viya attanopi kammaṃ nāseti,
atk-s0301a:1231_5: Āloketīti tava puthujjanikaiddhiyā jalantaṃ aṅguṭṭhakaṃ āloketi.
atk-s0301a:1231_6: Na passatīti ettha “neva telaṃ na vaṭṭi na dīpakapallikā,
atk-s0301a:1231_7: therassa pana ānubhāvenāyaṃ jalatī”ti imaṃ kāraṇaṃ na passati.
atk-s0301a:1231_8: Dasa pajjoteti dasasu aṅgulīsu dasa padīpe.
atk-s0301a:1231_12: Vīriyaṃ paggayha paramavivekaṃ arahattamaggaṃ paṭipajji. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1233_1: Catutthe sambahulāti bahū suttantikā ābhidhammikā vinayadharā ca.
atk-s0301a:1233_2: Viharantīti satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā viharanti.
atk-s0301a:1233_3: Pakkamiṃsūti te kira tasmiṃ janapade aññataraṃ gāmaṃ upasaṅkamante disvā manussā pasannacittā āsanasālāya
atk-s0301a:1233_10: temāsaṃ vasathā”ti paṭiññaṃ kāretvā gamanāgamanasampanne ṭhāne senāsanāni kāretvā catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0301a:1233_12: tumhehi garukassa satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahitaṃ,
atk-s0301a:1233_14: Māsassa aṭṭha divase dhammassavanaṃ katvā gaṇasaṅgaṇikaṃ pahāya appamattā viharathā”ti.
atk-s0301a:1233_19: Tesaṃ dhammassavanadivase dhammaṃ kathentānaṃyeva aruṇo uggacchati.
atk-s0301a:1233_22: Padhānadivase sūriyatthaṅgamane gaṇḍiṃ paharitvāva caṅkamaṃ otaritvā padhānaṃ karontānaṃyeva.
atk-s0301a:1233_23: Te evaṃ vassaṃ vassitvā pavāretvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0301a:1233_25: Paridevamānāti “idāni tathārūpaṃ madhuraṃ dhammassavanaṃ pañhākathanaṃ kuto labhissāmī”tiādīni vatvā rodamānā.
atk-s0301a:1234_3: Magā viyāti yathā magā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ pabbatapāde vā vanasaṇḍe vā vicarantā –
atk-s0301a:1234_5: yattheva nesaṃ gocaraphāsutā ca hoti paripanthābhāvo ca,
atk-s0301a:1234_8: amhākaṃ ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ santako paveṇiāgato”ti agahetvā yattheva nesaṃ utusappāyaṃ bhojanasappāyaṃ
atk-s0301a:1236_3: Gihisaññattibahuloti rattiñca divā ca bahukālaṃ gihī saññāpayanto.
atk-s0301a:1236_5: mayaṃ rājagahe vassaṃ upagantvā dhammaṃ saṅgāyissāma,
atk-s0301a:1236_6: gaccha tvaṃ araññaṃ pavisitvā uparimaggattayatthāya vāyāmaṃ karohī”ti.
atk-s0301a:1236_7: So bhagavato pattacīvaramādāya kosalaraṭṭhaṃ gantvā ekasmiṃ araññāvāse vasitvā punadivase ekaṃ gāmaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0301a:1236_16: vattapaṭivattaṃ karothā”ti bahuṃ vatvā parideviṃsu. Thero – “mā, āvuso, socittha,
atk-s0301a:1236_18: aniccā saṅkhārā”tiādīni vatvā te saññāpetvā bhattakiccāvasāne vasanaṭṭhānameva gacchati.
atk-s0301a:1236_19: Manussā sāyampi tattha gantvā tatheva paridevanti.
atk-s0301a:1236_22: Ajjhabhāsīti “ayaṃ thero bhikkhusaṅghassa kathaṃ sutvā ‘samaṇadhammaṃ karissāmī’ti araññaṃ pavisitvā idāni gihī saññāpento viharati,
atk-s0301a:1237_1: Hadayasmiṃ opiyāti kiccato ca ārammaṇato ca hadayamhi pakkhipitvā.
atk-s0301a:1237_2: “Nibbānaṃ pāpuṇissāmī”ti vīriyaṃ karonto nibbānaṃ kiccato hadayamhi opeti nāma,
atk-s0301a:1237_3: nibbānārammaṇaṃ pana samāpattiṃ appetvā nisīdanto ārammaṇato.
atk-s0301a:1237_6: Biḷibiḷikāti ayaṃ gihīhi saddhiṃ biḷibiḷikathā. Pañcamaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1239_5: Tā hi sugatiyaṃ ṭhitā sampattiṃ anubhavanti,
atk-s0301a:1239_7: Tato cutā hi tā nirayepi upapajjantīti duggatā.
atk-s0301a:1239_8: Patiṭṭhitāti sakkāyasmiṃ hi patiṭṭhahanto aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi patiṭṭhāti –
atk-s0301a:1240_0: Natthi dānīti sā kira devadhītā there balavasinehā ahosi,
atk-s0301a:1240_5: Ekasmiṃ divase therassa jiṇṇacīvarassa coḷakabhikkhaṃ carato saṅkārakūṭe dibbadussaṃ ṭhapetvā pakkami.
atk-s0301a:1240_10: Atha dve aggasāvakā anuruddhatthero cāti tayo janā cīvaraṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0301a:1240_12: Niṭṭhitacīvarassa piṇḍāya carato devatā piṇḍapātaṃ samādapeti.
atk-s0301a:1240_15: Tadā pana attatatiyā āgantvā divāṭṭhāne theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā –
atk-s0301a:1240_16: “mayaṃ manāpakāyikā nāma manasā icchiticchitarūpaṃ māpemā”ti āha. Thero –
atk-s0301a:1240_20: Tā therassa manaṃ ñatvā sabbāva nīlavaṇṇā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0301a:1240_23: “thero amhākaṃ dassanaṃ assādetī”ti tā samajjaṃ kātuṃ āraddhā,
atk-s0301a:1240_28: “na amhākaṃ dassanaṃ thero assādetī”ti ñatvā sinehaṃ vā santhavaṃ vā alabhamānā nibbinditvā gantumāraddhā.
atk-s0301a:1240_30: “mā punappunaṃ āgacchiṃsū”ti arahattaṃ byākaronto imaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0301a:1240_32: Jātisaṃsāroti tattha tattha jātisaṅkhāto saṃsāro. Chaṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1242_1: Sattame atikālenāti sabbarattiṃ niddāyitvā balavapaccūse koṭisammuñjaniyā thokaṃ sammajjitvā mukhaṃ dhovitvā yāgubhikkhāya pātova pavisati.
atk-s0301a:1242_2: Atidivāti yāguṃ ādāya āsanasālaṃ gantvā pivitvā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne nipanno niddāyitvā –
atk-s0301a:1242_3: “manussānaṃ bhojanavelāya paṇītaṃ bhikkhaṃ labhissāmī”ti upakaṭṭhe majjhanhike uṭṭhāya dhammakaraṇena
atk-s0301a:1242_4: udakaṃ gahetvā akkhīni pamajjitvā piṇḍāya caritvā yāvadatthaṃ bhuñjitvā majjhanhike vītivatte paṭikkamati.
atk-s0301a:1242_5: Divā ca āgantvāti atikāle paviṭṭhena nāma aññehi bhikkhūhi paṭhamataraṃ āgantabbaṃ hoti,
atk-s0301a:1242_6: tvaṃ pana ativiya divā āgantvā gatāsīti attho.
atk-s0301a:1242_7: Bhāyāmi nāgadattanti taṃ nāgadattaṃ ahaṃ bhāyāmi.
atk-s0301a:1244_2: So kira satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā taṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ pavisitvā dutiyadivase gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi pāsādikehi abhikkantādīhi.
atk-s0301a:1244_3: Aññataraṃ kulaṃ tassa iriyāpathe pasīditvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā piṇḍapātaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0301a:1244_6: Thero adhivāsetvā tesaṃ āhāraṃ paribhuñjamāno vīriyaṃ paggayha ghaṭento arahattaṃ patvā cintesi –
atk-s0301a:1244_10: Ajjhabhāsīti sā kira therassa khīṇāsavabhāvaṃ ajānantī cintesi –
atk-s0301a:1245_0: Saṇṭhāneti nagaradvārassa āsanne manussānaṃ bhaṇḍakaṃ otāretvā vissamanaṭṭhāne.
atk-s0301a:1245_3: Mañca tañcāti mañca kathenti tañca kathenti.
atk-s0301a:1245_5: Bahū hi saddā paccūhāti bahukā ete lokasmiṃ paṭilomasaddā.
atk-s0301a:1245_7: tena vā tapassinā na maṅku hotabbaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1245_8: Na hi tenāti na hi tena parehi vuttavacanena satto kilissati,
atk-s0301a:1245_9: attanā katena pana pāpakammeneva kilissatīti dasseti.
atk-s0301a:1245_10: Vātamigo yathāti yathā vane vātamigo vāteritānaṃ paṇṇādīnaṃ saddena paritassati,
atk-s0301a:1245_12: Nāssa sampajjate vatanti tassa lahucittassa vataṃ na sampajjati.
atk-s0301a:1245_13: Thero pana khīṇāsavattā sampannavatoti veditabbo. Aṭṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1247_1: Navame vajjiputtakoti vajjiraṭṭhe rājaputto chattaṃ pahāya pabbajito.
atk-s0301a:1247_2: Sabbaratticāroti kattikanakkhattaṃ ghosetvā sakalanagaraṃ dhajapaṭākādīhi paṭimaṇḍetvā pavattito sabbaratticāro.
atk-s0301a:1247_3: Idañhi nakkhattaṃ yāva cātumahārājikehi ekābaddhaṃ hoti.
atk-s0301a:1247_4: Tūriyatāḷitavāditanigghosasaddanti bheriāditūriyānaṃ tāḷitānaṃ vīṇādīnañca vāditānaṃ nigghosasaddaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1247_5: Abhāsīti vesāliyaṃ kira satta rājasahassāni sattasatāni satta ca rājāno,
atk-s0301a:1247_7: Tesu alaṅkatapaṭiyattesu nakkhattakīḷanatthāya vīthiṃ otiṇṇesu saṭṭhihatthe mahācaṅkame caṅkamamāno nabhassa
atk-s0301a:1247_8: majjhe ṭhitaṃ candaṃ disvā caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ phalakaṃ nissāya ṭhito abhāsi.
atk-s0301a:1247_9: Apaviddhaṃva vanasmiṃ dārukanti vatthaveṭhanālaṅkārarahitattā vane chaḍḍitadārukaṃ viya jātaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1247_10: Pāpiyoti lāmakataro amhehi añño koci atthi.
atk-s0301a:1247_11: Pihayantīti thero āraññiko paṃsukūliko piṇḍapātiko sapadānacāriko appiccho santuṭṭhoti bahū tuyhaṃ patthayantīti attho.
atk-s0301a:1249_2: Sajjhāyabahuloti nissaraṇapariyattivasena sajjhāyanato bahutaraṃ kālaṃ sajjhāyanto.
atk-s0301a:1249_3: So kira ācariyassa divāṭṭhānaṃ sammajjitvā ācariyaṃ udikkhanto tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0301a:1249_4: Atha naṃ āgacchantaṃ disvāva paccuggantvā pattacīvaraṃ paṭiggahetvā paññattāsane nisinnassa tālavaṇṭavātaṃ
atk-s0301a:1249_5: datvā pānīyaṃ āpucchitvā pāde dhovitvā telaṃ makkhetvā vanditvā ṭhito uddesaṃ gahetvā yāva sūriyatthaṅgamā
atk-s0301a:1249_7: So nhānakoṭṭhake udakaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā aṅgārakapalle aggiṃ karoti.
atk-s0301a:1249_8: Ācariyassa nhatvā āgatassa pādesu udakaṃ puñchitvā piṭṭhiparikammaṃ katvā vanditvā uddesaṃ gahetvā paṭhamayāme
atk-s0301a:1249_9: sajjhāyaṃ katvā majjhimayāme sarīraṃ samassāsetvā pacchimayāme uddesaṃ gahetvā yāva aruṇuggamanā sajjhāyaṃ
atk-s0301a:1249_11: Tato sesaṃ upādāyarūpaṃ bhūtarūpaṃ nāmarūpanti pañcasu khandhesu vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0301a:1249_12: Appossukkoti uddesaggahaṇe ca sajjhāyakaraṇīye ca nirussukko.
atk-s0301a:1249_13: Saṅkasāyatīti yassa dāni atthāya ahaṃ sajjhāyaṃ kareyyaṃ,
atk-s0301a:1249_15: Kiṃ me idāni sajjhāyenāti phalasamāpattisukhena kālaṃ ativatteti.
atk-s0301a:1249_17: “kiṃ nu kho assa therassa aphāsukaṃ jātaṃ,
atk-s0301a:1249_19: Kena nu kho kāraṇena pubbe viya madhurassarena na sajjhāyatī”ti?
atk-s0301a:1250_8: Nikkhepananti tassa diṭṭhasutādino vissajjanaṃ santo vadantīti dīpeti,
atk-s0301a:1250_10: Ettāvatā “thero buddhavacanaṃ na vissajjāpetī”ti na niccakālaṃ sajjhāyanteneva bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0301a:1250_12: “ettakassāhaṃ atthassa vā dhammassa vā ādhāro bhavituṃ samattho”ti ñatvā vaṭṭadukkhassa antakiriyāya paṭipajjitabbaṃ. Dasamaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1252_1: Ekādasame akusale vitakketi kāmavitakkādayo tayo mahāvitakke.
atk-s0301a:1254_0: 232. Dvādasame yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ devatāsaṃyutte nandanavagge vuttameva. Dvādasamaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1258_1: Cuddasame ajjhabhāsīti taṃ bhikkhuṃ nāḷe gahetvā padumaṃ siṅghamānaṃ disvāva –
atk-s0301a:1258_2: “ayaṃ bhikkhu satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ araññaṃ paviṭṭho gandhārammaṇaṃ upanijjhāyati,
atk-s0301a:1258_3: svāyaṃ ajja upasiṅghaṃ svepi punadivasepi upasiṅghissati,
atk-s0301a:1258_4: evamassa sā gandhataṇhā vaḍḍhitvā diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaṃ atthaṃ nāsessati,
atk-s0301a:1259_0: Ekaṅgametaṃ theyyānanti thenitabbānaṃ rūpārammaṇādīnaṃ pañcakoṭṭhāsānaṃ idaṃ ekaṅgaṃ,
atk-s0301a:1259_3: Ārāti dūre nāḷe gahetvā nāmetvā dūre ṭhito upasiṅghāmīti vadati.
atk-s0301a:1260_1: Tasmiṃ kira devatāya saddhiṃ kathenteyeva eko tāpaso otaritvā bhisakhananādīni kātuṃ āraddho,
atk-s0301a:1260_6: Na vuccatīti gandhacoroti vā pupphacoroti vā kasmā na vuccati.
atk-s0301a:1261_2: Dhāticelaṃva makkhitoti yathā dhātiyā nivatthakiliṭṭhavatthaṃ uccārapassāvapaṃsumasikaddamādīhi makkhitaṃ,
atk-s0301a:1261_6: na taṃ lāmakā hīnādhimuttikā micchāpaṭipannakapuggalā labhanti.
atk-s0301a:1261_7: Tasmiṃ pana attabhāve maggaphalānaṃ bhabbarūpā puggalā taṃ labhanti,
atk-s0301a:1262_4: Neva taṃ upajīvāmāti devatā kira cintesi –
atk-s0301a:1262_6: sā maṃ codessati sāressatīti pamādampi anuyuñjeyya,
atk-s0301a:1268_4: Rūpaṃ na jīvanti vadantīti yadi buddhā rūpaṃ jīvanti na vadanti,
atk-s0301a:1268_5: yadi rūpaṃ satto puggaloti evaṃ na vadantīti attho.
atk-s0301a:1268_7: Kutassa aṭṭhīyakapiṇḍametīti assa sattassa aṭṭhiyakapiṇḍañca kuto āgacchati?
atk-s0301a:1268_11: athassa imāni ca aṭṭhīni imā ca maṃsapesiyo kuto āgacchantīti pucchati.
atk-s0301a:1268_12: Kathaṃ nvayaṃ sajjati gabbharasminti kena nu kāraṇena ayaṃ satto mātukucchismiṃ sajjati laggati,
atk-s0301a:1268_15: “ekappahāreneva satto mātukucchismiṃ nibbattatī”ti gahetvā gabbhaseyyakasattassa mātā macchamaṃsādīni khādati,
atk-s0301a:1268_16: sabbāni ekarattivāsena pacitvā pheṇaṃ viya vilīyanti.
atk-s0301a:1268_21: anupubbena pana vaḍḍhatī”ti dassento paṭhamaṃ kalalaṃ hotītiādimāha.
atk-s0301a:1268_22: Tattha paṭhamanti paṭhamena paṭisandhiviññāṇena saddhiṃ tissoti vā phussoti vā nāmaṃ natthi,
atk-s0301a:1268_23: atha kho tīhi jātiuṇṇaṃsūhi katasuttagge saṇṭhitatelabinduppamāṇaṃ kalalaṃ hoti,
atk-s0301a:1271_0: Kalalā hoti abbudanti tasmā kalalā sattāhaccayena maṃsadhovanaudakavaṇṇaṃ abbudaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-s0301a:1274_0: Abbudā jāyate pesīti tasmāpi abbudā sattāhaccayena vilīnatipusadisā pesi nāma sañjāyati.
atk-s0301a:1274_2: Gāmadārikā hi supakkāni maricāni gahetvā sāṭakante bhaṇḍikaṃ katvā pīḷetvā maṇḍaṃ ādāya kapāle pakkhipitvā ātape ṭhapenti,
atk-s0301a:1277_0: Pesi nibbattatī ghanoti tato pesito sattāhaccayena kukkuṭaṇḍasaṇṭhāno ghano nāma maṃsapiṇḍo nibbattati,
atk-s0301a:1282_0: Ghanā pasākhā jāyantīti pañcame sattāhe dvinnaṃ hatthapādānaṃ sīsassa catthāya pañca pīḷakā jāyanti,
atk-s0301a:1283_0: Ito paraṃ chaṭṭhasattamādīni sattāhāni atikkamma desanaṃ saṅkhipitvā dvācattālīse sattāhe pariṇatakālaṃ gahetvā dassento kesātiādimāha.
atk-s0301a:1283_1: Tattha kesā lomā nakhāpi cāti dvācattālīse sattāhe etāni jāyanti.
atk-s0301a:1284_0: Tena so tattha yāpetīti tassa hi nābhito uṭṭhito nāḷo mātu udarapaṭalena ekābaddho hoti,
atk-s0301a:1286_1: Dutiye sakkanāmakoti evaṃ nāmako eko yakkho,
atk-s0301a:1288_3: Ṭaṅkitamañceti dīghamañce pādamajjhe vijjhitvā aṭaniyo pavesetvā katamañce.
atk-s0301a:1288_8: Catunnaṃ pāsāṇānaṃ upari pāsāṇaṃ attharitvā katagehampi “ṭaṅkitamañco”ti vuccati.
atk-s0301a:1288_10: So kira kassapassa bhagavato sāsane pabbajitvā dūraṭṭhānato āgato sedamalaggahitena gattena supaññattaṃ
atk-s0301a:1288_12: tassa parisuddhasīlassa taṃ kammaṃ suddhavatthe kāḷakaṃ viya ahosi.
atk-s0301a:1288_13: So tasmiṃ attabhāve visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ asakkonto kālaṃkatvā gayāgāmadvāre saṅkāraṭṭhāne yakkho hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0301a:1288_14: Nibbattamattasseva cassa sakalasarīraṃ kathinasūcīhi gavicchivijjhitaṃ viya jātaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1289_0: Athekadivasaṃ bhagavā paccūsasamaye lokaṃ olokento taṃ yakkhaṃ paṭhamāvajjanasseva āpāthaṃ āgataṃ disvā –
atk-s0301a:1289_2: Kiṃ nu khvāssa maṃ āgamma sotthikāraṇaṃ bhaveyyā”ti?
atk-s0301a:1289_4: Athassa saṅgahaṃ kātukāmo surattadupaṭṭaṃ nivāsetvā sugatamahācīvaraṃ pārupitvā devavimānakappaṃ gandhakuṭiṃ
atk-s0301a:1289_5: pahāya hatthigavāssamanussakukkurādikuṇapaduggandhaṃ saṅkāraṭṭhānaṃ gantvā tattha mahāgandhakuṭiyaṃ viya nisīdi.
atk-s0301a:1290_0: Kharoti suṃsumārapiṭṭhi viya chadaniṭṭhakāhi visamacchadanapiṭṭhi viya ca kharasarīro.
atk-s0301a:1290_1: So kira kassapasammāsambuddhakāle sīlasampanno upāsako ekadivase vihāre cittattharaṇādīhi atthatāya bhūmiyā
atk-s0301a:1290_2: saṅghike attharaṇe attano uttarāsaṅgaṃ apaccattharitvā nipajji.
atk-s0301a:1290_3: Saṅghikaṃ telaṃ abhājetvā attano uttarāsaṅgaṃ apaccattharitvā nipajji.
atk-s0301a:1290_4: Saṅghikaṃ telaṃ abhājetvā attano hatthehi sarīraṃ makkhesītipi vadanti.
atk-s0301a:1290_5: So tena kammena sagge nibbattituṃ asakkonto tasseva gāmassa dvāre saṅkāraṭṭhāne yakkho hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0301a:1291_0: Avidūre atikkamantīti gocaraṃ pariyesantā samāgamaṭṭhānaṃ vā gacchantā āsanne ṭhāne gacchanti.
atk-s0301a:1291_2: kharalomo paṭhamataraṃ disvā sūcilomaṃ yakkhaṃ etadavoca –
atk-s0301a:1291_4: esa tava bhavanaṃ pavisitvā nisinno eko samaṇoti.
atk-s0301a:1291_6: samaṇako esoti so kira yo maṃ passitvā bhīto palāyati,
atk-s0301a:1291_10: Tasmā “ayaṃ maṃ disvā bhīto palāyissatī”ti maññamāno evamāha.
atk-s0301a:1292_0: Kāyaṃ upanāmesīti bheravarūpaṃ nimminitvā mahāmukhaṃ vivaritvā sakalasarīre lomāni uṭṭhāpetvā kāyaṃ upanāmesi.
atk-s0301a:1292_1: Apanāmesīti ratanasatikaṃ suvaṇṇagghanikaṃ viya thokaṃ apanāmesi.
atk-s0301a:1292_3: So gūthaṃ viya aggi viya kaṇhasappo viya ca parivajjetabbo,
atk-s0301a:1292_5: Evaṃ vutte pana sūcilomo “pāpako kira me samphasso”ti kuddho pañhaṃ taṃ,
atk-s0301a:1292_7: Cittaṃ vā te khipissāmīti yesañhi amanussā cittaṃ khipitukāmā honti,
atk-s0301a:1292_8: tesaṃ setamukhaṃ nīlodaraṃ surattahatthapādaṃ mahāsīsaṃ pajjalitanettaṃ bheravaṃ vā attabhāvaṃ nimminitvā dassenti,
atk-s0301a:1292_10: kathentānaṃyeva vā mukhe hatthaṃ pakkhipitvā hadayaṃ maddanti,
atk-s0301a:1292_11: tena te sattā ummattakā honti khittacittā.
atk-s0301a:1292_13: Pāragaṅgāyāti dvīsu pādesu gahetvā taṃ āviñchetvā yathā na punāgacchasi,
atk-s0301a:1292_14: evaṃ pāraṃ vā gaṅgāya khipissāmīti vadati.
atk-s0301a:1293_2: Kumārakā dhaṅkamivossajantīti yathā kumārakā kākaṃ gahetvā ossajanti khipanti,
atk-s0301a:1293_3: evaṃ pāpavitakkā kuto samuṭṭhāya cittaṃ ossajantīti pucchati?
atk-s0301a:1294_0: Itonidānāti ayaṃ attabhāvo nidānaṃ etesanti ito nidānā.
atk-s0301a:1294_2: Ito samuṭṭhāya manovitakkāti yathā dīghasuttakena pāde baddhaṃ kākaṃ kumārakā tassa suttapariyantaṃ aṅguliyaṃ veṭhetvā ossajanti,
atk-s0301a:1294_3: so dūraṃ gantvāpi puna tesaṃ pādamūleyeva patati,
atk-s0301a:1294_4: evameva ito attabhāvato samuṭṭhāya pāpavitakkā cittaṃ ossajanti.
atk-s0301a:1295_2: Nigrodhasseva khandhajāti nigrodhakhandhe jātā pārohā viya.
atk-s0301a:1295_3: Puthūti bahū anekappakārā pāpavitakkā taṃsampayuttakilesā ca.
atk-s0301a:1295_6: Māluvāva vitatā vaneti yathā vane māluvā latā yaṃ rukkhaṃ nissāya jāyati,
atk-s0301a:1295_8: aggato yāva mūlā punappunaṃ saṃsibbitvā ajjhottharitvā otatavitatā tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0301a:1295_10: puthū vā sattā tehi kilesakāmehi vatthukāmesu visattā.
atk-s0301a:1295_11: Ye naṃ pajānantīti ye “attasambhūtā”ti ettha vuttaṃ attabhāvaṃ jānanti.
atk-s0301a:1296_0: Yatonidānanti yaṃ nidānamassa attabhāvassa tañca jānanti.
atk-s0301a:1296_1: Te naṃ vinodentīti te evaṃ attabhāvasaṅkhātassa dukkhasaccassa nidānabhūtaṃ samudayasaccaṃ maggasaccena vinodenti.
atk-s0301a:1296_2: Te duttaranti te samudayasaccaṃ nīharantā idaṃ duttaraṃ kilesoghaṃ taranti.
atk-s0301a:1296_3: Atiṇṇapubbanti anamatagge saṃsāre supinantepi na tiṇṇapubbaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1296_5: Iti imāya gāthāya cattāri saccāni pakāsento arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0301a:1296_6: Desanāvasāne sūcilomo tasmiṃyeva padese ṭhito desanānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhito.
atk-s0301a:1296_7: Sotāpannā ca nāma na kiliṭṭhattabhāve tiṭṭhantīti saha phalapaṭilābhenassa sarīre setakaṇḍupīḷakasūciyo sabbā patitā.
atk-s0301a:1296_8: So dibbavatthanivattho dibbavaradukūluttarāsaṅgo dibbaveṭhanaveṭhito dibbābharaṇagandhamāladharo suvaṇṇavaṇṇo hutvā bhummadevatāparihāraṃ paṭilabhīti. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1298_5: Verā na parimuccatīti ahaṃ satimāti ettakena verato na muccati.
atk-s0301a:1298_12: yassa arahato sabbakālaṃ ahiṃsāya rato mano,
atk-s0301a:1298_14: tassa kenaci puggalena saddhiṃ veraṃ nāma natthi yakkhāti.
atk-s0301a:1300_1: Pañcame yakkhena gahito hotīti so kira tassā upāsikāya ekaputtako.
atk-s0301a:1300_3: So pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya sīlavā ahosi vattasampanno,
atk-s0301a:1300_5: māsassa aṭṭhamīdivase pāto vuṭṭhāya udakamāḷake udakaṃ upaṭṭhāpetvā dhammassavanaggaṃ sammajjitvā dīpaṃ jāletvā madhurassarena dhammassavanaṃ ghoseti.
atk-s0301a:1300_9: kāso vā bādhatī”ti kiñci paccāhāraṃ akatvā dhammāsanaṃ abhiruhitvā ākāsagaṅgaṃ otārento viya sarabhāṇaṃ vatvā otaranto –
atk-s0301a:1300_11: Tassa manussā mātāpitaro pattiyā dinnabhāvaṃ na jānanti.
atk-s0301a:1300_17: Sīlasampannā ca nāma bhikkhū sadevakassa lokassa piyā hontīti tasmiṃ sāmaṇere devatā salajjā sagāravā
atk-s0301a:1300_18: mahābrahmaṃ viya aggikkhandhaṃ viya ca naṃ maññanti.
atk-s0301a:1300_19: Sāmaṇere gāravena taṃ yakkhiniṃ garuṃ katvā passanti.
atk-s0301a:1300_20: Dhammassavanayakkhasamāgamādīsu “sānumātā sānumātā”ti yakkhiniyā aggāsanaṃ aggodakaṃ aggapiṇḍaṃ denti.
atk-s0301a:1300_21: Mahesakkhāpi yakkhā taṃ disvā maggā okkamanti,
atk-s0301a:1301_0: Atha kho sāmaṇero vuḍḍhimanvāya paripakkindriyo anabhiratipīḷito anabhiratiṃ vinodetuṃ asakkonto parūḷhakesanakho
atk-s0301a:1301_1: kiliṭṭhanivāsanapārupano kassaci anārocetvā pattacīvaramādāya ekakova mātu gharaṃ gato.
atk-s0301a:1301_4: tvaṃ pubbe ācariyupajjhāyehi vā daharasāmaṇerehi vā saddhiṃ idhāgacchasi.
atk-s0301a:1301_7: Saddhā upāsikā nānappakārena gharāvāse ādīnavaṃ dassetvā puttaṃ ovadamānāpi taṃ saññāpetuṃ asakkontī,
atk-s0301a:1301_8: “appeva nāma attano dhammatāyapi sallakkhessatī”ti anuyojetvāva – “tiṭṭha, tāta,
atk-s0301a:1301_10: yāguṃ pivitvā katabhattakiccassa te manāpāni vatthāni nīharitvā dassāmī”ti vatvā āsanaṃ paññāpetvā adāsi.
atk-s0301a:1301_13: Tato “bhattaṃ sampādessāmī”ti avidūre nisinnā taṇḍule dhovati.
atk-s0301a:1301_14: Tasmiṃ samaye sā yakkhinī “kahaṃ nu kho sāmaṇero?
atk-s0301a:1301_18: “mā heva kho me devatānaṃ antare lajjaṃ uppādeyya,
atk-s0301a:1301_19: gacchāmissa vibbhamane antarāyaṃ karomī”ti āgantvā sarīre adhimuccitvā gīvaṃ parivattetvā bhūmiyaṃ pātesi.
atk-s0301a:1301_20: So akkhīhi viparivattehi kheḷena paggharantena bhūmiyaṃ vipphandati.
atk-s0301a:1302_0: Abhāsīti upāsikā puttassa taṃ vippakāraṃ disvā vegena gantvā puttaṃ āliṅgetvā ūrūsu nipajjāpesi.
atk-s0301a:1303_0: Pāṭihāriyapakkhañcāti manussā “aṭṭhamīuposathassa paccuggamanañca anuggamanañca karissāmā”ti sattamiyāpi navamiyāpi uposathaṅgāni samādiyanti,
atk-s0301a:1303_1: cātuddasīpannarasīnaṃ paccuggamanānuggamanaṃ karontā terasiyāpi pāṭipadepi samādiyanti,
atk-s0301a:1303_2: “vassāvāsassa anuggamanaṃ karissāmā”ti dvinnaṃ pavāraṇānaṃ antare aḍḍhamāsaṃ nibaddhuposathikā bhavanti.
atk-s0301a:1303_7: Na te hi yakkhā kīḷantīti na te gahetvā yakkhā kilamenti.
atk-s0301a:1304_0: Puna cātuddasinti imāya gāthāya sāmaṇerassa kāye adhimuttā yakkhinī āha.
atk-s0301a:1304_1: Āvi vā yadi vā rahoti kassaci sammukhe vā parammukhe vā.
atk-s0301a:1304_8: mātā kese pakiriya assasantī passasantī rodati.
atk-s0301a:1304_11: Mātā me avidūre nisīditvā taṇḍule dhovati.
atk-s0301a:1305_2: Puna jīvaṃ mato hi soti uppabbajitvā puna jīvantopi so matakova,
atk-s0301a:1306_1: Tattha kukkuḷāti gharāvāso kira uṇhaṭṭhena kukkuḷā nāma hoti.
atk-s0301a:1306_6: imaṃ vippakāraṃ kassa mayaṃ ujjhāpayāma nijjhāpayāma ārocayāmā”ti vadati.
atk-s0301a:1306_7: Puna ḍayhitumicchasītiādittagharato nīhaṭabhaṇḍaṃ viya gharā nīharitvā buddhasāsane pabbajito puna mahāḍāhasadise gharāvāse ḍayhituṃ icchasīti attho.
atk-s0301a:1306_8: So mātari kathentiyā kathentiyā sallakkhetvā hirottappaṃ paṭilabhitvā,
atk-s0301a:1306_16: So ticīvaraṃ kārāpetvā upasampanno buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhanto tepiṭako hutvā sīlādīnaṃ āgataṭṭhāne taṃ
atk-s0301a:1306_17: taṃ pūrento nacirasseva arahattaṃ patvā mahādhammakathiko hutvā vīsavassasataṃ ṭhatvā sakalajambudīpaṃ
atk-s0301a:1308_1: Chaṭṭhe jetavaneti jetavanassa paccante kosambakakuṭi nāma atthi,
atk-s0301a:1308_3: Dhammapadānīti idha pāṭiyekkaṃ saṅgahaṃ āruḷhā chabbīsativaggā tanti adhippetā.
atk-s0301a:1308_4: Tatra thero tasmiṃ samaye antovihāre nisinno madhurassarena sarabhaññaṃ katvā appamādavaggaṃ bhāsati.
atk-s0301a:1308_5: Evaṃ tosesīti sā kira puttaṃ piyaṅkaraṃ aṅkenādāya jetavanassa pacchimabhāgato paṭṭhāya gocaraṃ pariyesantī
atk-s0301a:1308_6: anupubbena nagarābhimukhī hutvā uccārapassāvakheḷasiṅghāṇikadubbhojanāni pariyesamānā therassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0301a:1308_8: Tassā so saddo chaviādīni chetvā aṭṭhimiñjaṃ āhacca hadayaṅgamanīyo hutvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0301a:1308_11: Yakkhadārakassa pana daharatāya dhammassavane cittaṃ natthi.
atk-s0301a:1308_14: Na mayhaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā pariyesasī”ti punappunaṃ mātaraṃ codeti.
atk-s0301a:1308_15: Sā “dhammassavanassa me antarāyaṃ karotī”ti puttakaṃ “mā saddaṃ kari,
atk-s0301a:1308_17: Tattha mā saddaṃ karīti saddaṃ mā kari.
atk-s0301a:1309_0: Pāṇesu cāti gāthāya sā attano dhammatāya samādiṇṇaṃ pañcasīlaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0301a:1309_5: Api muccema pisācayoniyāti api nāma yakkhaloke uppannāni pañca verāni pahāya,
atk-s0301a:1309_6: yoniso paṭipajjitvā imāya chātakadubbhikkhāya pisācayakkhayoniyā muccema,
atk-s0301a:1311_1: Sattame tena kho pana samayenāti katarasamayena?
atk-s0301a:1311_3: Tadā kira bhagavā pacchābhatte mahājanassa dhammaṃ desetvā mahājanaṃ uyyojetvā nhānakoṭṭhake nhatvā gandhakuṭipariveṇe
atk-s0301a:1311_5: Athekacārikadvicārikādayo paṃsukūlikapiṇḍapātikabhikkhū attano attano vasanaṭṭhānehi nikkhamitvā āgamma
atk-s0301a:1311_6: dasabalaṃ vanditvā rattasāṇiyā parikkhipamānā viya nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0301a:1311_7: Atha nesaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ viditvā satthā nibbānapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhammakathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0301a:1312_0: Evaṃ tosesīti sā kira dhītaraṃ aṅkenādāya puttaṃ aṅguliyā gahetvā jetavanapiṭṭhiyaṃ pākāraparikkhepasamīpe
atk-s0301a:1312_5: vighāsādānaṃ dānaṃ dehī”ti kathentassa saddo samantā dvādasahatthamattameva gaṇhāti.
atk-s0301a:1312_6: Dhammaṃ desentassa sacepi cakkavāḷapariyantaṃ katvā parisā nisīdati,
atk-s0301a:1312_10: Tatrāyaṃ yakkhinī bahiparisāya ṭhitā saddaṃ na suṇāti,
atk-s0301a:1312_11: dvārakoṭṭhake ṭhitāya panassā mahatiyā buddhavīthiyā abhimukhe ṭhitā gandhakuṭi paññāyi.
atk-s0301a:1312_12: Sā nivāte dīpasikhā viya buddhagāravena hatthakukkuccādirahitaṃ niccalaṃ parisaṃ disvā –
atk-s0301a:1312_14: yato ahaṃ sappitelamadhuphāṇitādīsu kiñcideva pattato vā hatthato vā paggharantaṃ bhūmiyaṃ vā pana patitaṃ labhissāmī”ti antovihāraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0301a:1312_15: Dvārakoṭṭhake avaruddhakānaṃ nivāraṇatthāya ṭhitā ārakkhadevatā yakkhiniyā upanissayaṃ disvā na nivāresi.
atk-s0301a:1312_16: Tassā saha parisāya ekībhāvagamanena madhurassaro chaviādīni chinditvā aṭṭhimiñjaṃ āhacca aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0301a:1312_17: Taṃ dhammassavanatthāya niccalaṃ ṭhitaṃ purimanayeneva puttakā codayiṃsu.
atk-s0301a:1312_18: Sā “dhammassavanassa me antarāyaṃ karontī”ti puttake tuṇhī uttarike hohīti evaṃ tosesi.
atk-s0301a:1313_2: Sabbaganthappamocananti nibbānaṃ āgamma sabbe ganthā pamuccanti,
atk-s0301a:1313_6: Tato piyataranti yā ayaṃ assa dhammassa magganā patthanā,
atk-s0301a:1313_15: ayaṃ me bhaginī uttarāpi tuṇhībhūtāti vadati.
atk-s0301a:1313_17: mayaṃ pubbepi imaṃ saddhammameva ajānitvā idāni idaṃ khuppipāsādidukkhaṃ anubhavantā dukkhaṃ carāma viharāma.
atk-s0301a:1314_1: Dhammaṃ desentoyeva bhagavā parisaṃ sallakkhayamāno tassā yakkhiniyā ceva yakkhadārakassa ca sotāpattiphalassa
atk-s0301a:1314_2: upanissayaṃ disvā desanaṃ vinivaṭṭetvā catusaccakathaṃ dīpeti,
atk-s0301a:1314_3: taṃ sutvā tasmiṃyeva dese ṭhitā yakkhinī saddhiṃ puttena sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhitā.
atk-s0301a:1315_0: Idāni sā yakkhinī puttassa anumodanaṃ karontī sādhu kho paṇḍito nāmātiādimāha.
atk-s0301a:1315_1: Ajjāhamhi samuggatāti ahamhi ajja vaṭṭato uggatā samuggatā sāsane vā uggatā samuggatā,
atk-s0301a:1315_3: Diṭṭhānīti mayā ca tayā ca diṭṭhāni.
atk-s0301a:1315_8: Saha saccapaṭivedheneva sāpi sūcilomo viya sabbaṃ setakaṇḍukacchuādibhāvaṃ pahāya dibbasampattiṃ paṭilabhati saddhiṃ puttena.
atk-s0301a:1315_9: Dhītā panassā yathā nāma loke mātāpitūhi issariye laddhe puttānampi taṃ hoti,
atk-s0301a:1315_12: Tato paṭṭhāya ca sā saddhiṃ puttakehi gandhakuṭisamīparukkheyeva nivāsarukkhaṃ labhitvā sāyaṃ pātaṃ buddhadassanaṃ
atk-s0301a:1315_13: labhamānā dhammaṃ suṇamānā dīgharattaṃ tattheva vasi. Sattamaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1317_2: Anāthapiṇḍiko ca rājagahaseṭṭhi ca aññamaññaṃ bhaginipatikā honti.
atk-s0301a:1317_4: tadā rājagahaseṭṭhi taṃ gahetvā pañcasakaṭasatehi sāvatthiṃ gantvā yojanamatte ṭhito attano āgatabhāvaṃ jānāpeti.
atk-s0301a:1317_5: Anāthapiṇḍiko paccuggantvā tassa mahāsakkāraṃ katvā ekayānaṃ āropetvā sāvatthiṃ pavisati.
atk-s0301a:1318_0: Taṃ divasaṃ pana rājagahaseṭṭhi yojanamatte ṭhitena anāthapiṇḍikena āgatabhāvajānanatthaṃ pesitaṃ paṇṇaṃ na suṇi,
atk-s0301a:1318_2: So dhammakathaṃ sutvā svātanāya buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nimantetvā attano ghare uddhanakhaṇāpanadāruphālanādīni kāresi.
atk-s0301a:1318_4: idāni karissatī”ti gharadvārepi paccuggamanaṃ alabhitvā antogharaṃ paviṭṭho paṭisanthārampi na bahuṃ alattha. “Kiṃ,
atk-s0301a:1318_12: Khandhake āgatanayeneva kathaṃ pavattetvā tassa mukhato buddhasaddaṃ sutvā pañcavaṇṇaṃ pītiṃ paṭilabhi.
atk-s0301a:1318_13: Sā tassa sīsena uṭṭhāya yāva pādapiṭṭhiyā,
atk-s0301a:1318_21: “ghosopi kho eso dullabho lokasmiṃ yadidaṃ buddho”ti āha.
atk-s0301a:1318_22: Idaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “assosi kho anāthapiṇḍiko, gahapati,
atk-s0301a:1319_0: Etadahosi akālo kho ajjāti so kira taṃ seṭṭhiṃ pucchi,
atk-s0301a:1319_5: na sakkā tattha tumhādisehi imāya velāya gantu”nti ācikkhi.
atk-s0301a:1319_7: Buddhagatāya satiyā nipajjīti taṃdivasaṃ kirassa bhaṇḍasakaṭesu vā upaṭṭhākesu vā cittampi na uppajji,
atk-s0301a:1319_9: sattabhūmikaṃ pana pāsādaṃ āruyha supaññattālaṅkatavarasayane “buddho buddho”ti sajjhāyaṃ karontova nipajjitvā niddaṃ okkami.
atk-s0301a:1320_0: Rattiyā sudaṃ tikkhattuṃ uṭṭhāsi pabhātanti maññamānoti paṭhamayāme tāva vītivatte uṭṭhāya buddhaṃ anussari,
atk-s0301a:1320_4: dīpasahassujjalaṃ viya canduṭṭhānaṃ sūriyuṭṭhānaṃ viya ca jātaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1320_6: sūriyo uggato”ti uṭṭhāya ākāsatale ṭhitaṃ candaṃ ulloketvā “ekova yāmo gato,
atk-s0301a:1320_7: aññe dve atthī”ti puna pavisitvā nipajji.
atk-s0301a:1320_9: Pacchimayāmāvasāne pana balavapaccūseyeva uṭṭhāya ākāsatalaṃ āgantvā mahādvārābhimukhova ahosi,
atk-s0301a:1321_1: paṭhamadassaneneva sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ aggupaṭṭhāko hutvā asadisaṃ saṅghārāmaṃ
atk-s0301a:1321_3: na yuttamassa dvāraṃ pidahitu”nti cintetvā vivariṃsu.
atk-s0301a:1321_4: Antaradhāyīti rājagahaṃ kira ākiṇṇamanussaṃ antonagare nava koṭiyo,
atk-s0301a:1321_5: bahinagare navāti taṃ upanissāya aṭṭhārasa manussakoṭiyo vasanti.
atk-s0301a:1321_6: Avelāya matamanusse bahi nīharituṃ asakkontā aṭṭālake ṭhatvā bahidvāre khipanti.
atk-s0301a:1321_7: Mahāseṭṭhi nagarato bahinikkhantamattova allasarīraṃ pādena akkami,
atk-s0301a:1321_14: Saddamanussāvesīti “seṭṭhissa ussāhaṃ janessāmī”ti suvaṇṇakiṅkiṇikaṃ ghaṭṭento viya madhurassarena saddaṃ anussāvesi.
atk-s0301a:1322_0: Sataṃ kaññāsahassānīti purimapadānipi imināva sahassapadena saddhiṃ sambandhanīyāni.
atk-s0301a:1322_6: Padavītihārassāti padavītihāro nāma samagamane dvinnaṃ padānaṃ antare muṭṭhiratanamattaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1322_7: Kalaṃ nāgghanti soḷasinti taṃ ekaṃ padavītihāraṃ soḷasabhāge katvā tato eko koṭṭhāso puna soḷasadhā,
atk-s0301a:1322_8: tato eko soḷasadhāti evaṃ soḷasa vāre soḷasadhā bhinnassa eko koṭṭhāso soḷasikalā nāma,
atk-s0301a:1322_9: taṃ soḷasikalaṃ etāni cattāri satasahassāni na agghanti.
atk-s0301a:1322_11: sataṃ hatthisahassāni sataṃ assasahassāni sataṃ rathasahassāni sataṃ kaññāsahassāni,
atk-s0301a:1322_12: tā ca kho āmukkamaṇikuṇḍalā sakalajambudīparājadhītaro vāti imasmā ettakā lābhā vihāraṃ gacchantassa
atk-s0301a:1322_14: Idaṃ pana vihāragamanaṃ kassa vasena gahitanti?
atk-s0301a:1322_21: sikkhāpadesu vā saraṇesu vā patiṭṭhahissāmī”ti gacchatopi vasena vaṭṭatiyeva.
atk-s0301a:1323_7: Apica purato purato gacchanto bhiṃsanake susānamagge aṭṭhikasaṅkhalikasamaṃsalohitantiādīni anekavidhāni kuṇapāni addasa.
atk-s0301a:1323_9: Taṃ sabbaṃ parissayaṃ punappunaṃ buddhagataṃ pasādaṃ vaḍḍhetvā maddanto agamāsiyeva.
atk-s0301a:1324_0: Ehi sudattāti so kira seṭṭhi gacchamānova cintesi –
atk-s0301a:1324_1: “imasmiṃ loke bahū pūraṇakassapādayo titthiyā ‘mayaṃ buddhā mayaṃ buddhā’ti vadanti,
atk-s0301a:1324_2: kathaṃ nu kho ahaṃ satthu buddhabhāvaṃ jāneyya”nti?
atk-s0301a:1324_5: kuladattiyaṃ pana me nāmaṃ aññatra mayā na koci jānāti.
atk-s0301a:1325_4: Idañca pana vatvā satthā tassa anupubbikathaṃ kathetvā matthake cattāri saccāni pakāsesi.
atk-s0301a:1325_5: Seṭṭhi dhammadesanaṃ sutvā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nimantetvā punadivasato paṭṭhāya mahādānaṃ dātuṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0301a:1325_10: So “alaṃ tumhe bahukiccā”ti sabbe paṭikkhipitvā pañcahi sakaṭasatehi ānītavibhavena sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0301a:1325_11: Dānapariyosāne ca bhagavantaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ vassāvāsaṃ paṭijānāpetvā rājagahassa ca sāvatthiyā ca antare
atk-s0301a:1325_12: yojane yojane satasahassaṃ datvā pañcacattālīsa vihāre kārento sāvatthiṃ gantvā jetavanamahāvihāraṃ kāretvā
atk-s0301a:1327_1: Navame rathikāya rathikanti ekaṃ rathikaṃ gahetvā tato aparaṃ gacchanto rathikāya rathikaṃ upasaṅkamanto nāma hoti.
atk-s0301a:1327_5: Kiṃ me katāti kiṃ ime katā?
atk-s0301a:1327_7: Madhupītāva seyareti gandhamadhupānaṃ pītā viya sayanti.
atk-s0301a:1327_8: Gandhamadhupānaṃ pīto kira sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0301a:1328_0: Tañca pana appaṭivānīyanti tañca pana dhammaṃ appaṭivānīyaṃ deseti.
atk-s0301a:1328_1: Bāhirakañhi sumadhurampi bhojanaṃ punappunaṃ bhuñjantassa na ruccati,
atk-s0301a:1328_6: Imaṃ hi dhammaṃ paṇḍitā vassasatampi vassasahassampi suṇantā tittiṃ na gacchanti.
atk-s0301a:1328_9: Yathā hi bāhirāni asambhinnapāyāsādīnipi sappimadhusakkharāhi āsittāni yojitāneva madhurāni ojavantāni honti,
atk-s0301a:1328_11: Ayaṃ hi attano dhammatāya madhuro ceva ojavā ca,
atk-s0301a:1328_14: Pivanti maññe sappaññāti paṇḍitapurisā pivanti viya.
atk-s0301a:1328_15: Valāhakameva panthagūti valāhakantarato nikkhantaudakaṃ ghammābhitattā pathikā viya. Navamaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1330_0: 244. Dasame puññaṃ vata pasavi bahunti bahuṃ vata puññaṃ pasavatīti. Dasamaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1333_1: Dvādasame āḷaviyanti āḷavīti taṃ raṭṭhampi nagarampi.
atk-s0301a:1333_2: Tañca bhavanaṃ nagarassa avidūre gāvutamatte ṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1333_3: Bhagavā tattha viharanto taṃ nagaraṃ upanissāya āḷaviyaṃ viharatīti vutto.
atk-s0301a:1333_4: Āḷavakassa yakkhassa bhavaneti ettha pana ayamanupubbikathā –
atk-s0301a:1333_5: āḷavako kira rājā vividhanāṭakūpabhogaṃ chaḍḍetvā corapaṭibāhanatthaṃ paṭirājanisedhanatthaṃ byāyāmakaraṇatthañca
atk-s0301a:1333_6: sattame sattame divase migavaṃ gacchanto ekadivasaṃ balakāyena saddhiṃ katikaṃ akāsi –
atk-s0301a:1333_10: javasampanno rājā dhanuṃ gahetvā pattikova tiyojanaṃ taṃ migaṃ anubandhi.
atk-s0301a:1333_12: Atha parikkhīṇajavaṃ taṃ udakaṃ viya pavisitvā ṭhitaṃ vadhitvā dvidhā chetvā anatthikopi maṃsena “nāsakkhi
atk-s0301a:1333_13: migaṃ gahetu”nti apavādamocanatthaṃ kājenādāya āgacchanto nagarassāvidūre bahalapattapalāsaṃ mahānigrodhaṃ
atk-s0301a:1333_15: Tasmiñca nigrodhe āḷavako yakkho mahārājasantikā bhavanaṃ labhitvā majjhanhikasamaye tassa rukkhassa
atk-s0301a:1333_16: chāyāya phuṭṭhokāsaṃ paviṭṭhe pāṇino khādanto paṭivasati.
atk-s0301a:1333_20: ahaṃ te divase divase manussañca thālipākañca pesessāmī”ti. Yakkho –
atk-s0301a:1333_22: ahaṃ pana bhavanaṃ anupagatañca ananuññātañca khādituṃ na labhāmi,
atk-s0301a:1333_25: taṃ divasaṃ maṃ gahetvā khādā”ti attānaṃ anujānitvā tena mutto nagarābhimukho agamāsi.
atk-s0301a:1334_0: Balakāyo magge khandhāvāraṃ bandhitvā ṭhito rājānaṃ disvā, “kiṃ, mahārāja,
atk-s0301a:1334_3: Rājā taṃ pavattiṃ anārocetvā nagaraṃ gantvā katapātarāso nagaraguttikaṃ āmantetvā etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0301a:1334_14: So kālasseva vuṭṭhāya bandhanāgāradvāre ṭhatvā ye ye vajjhā honti,
atk-s0301a:1334_18: taṃ gehaṃ netvā nhāpetvā bhojetvā ca “imaṃ thālipākaṃ yakkhassa dehī”ti peseti.
atk-s0301a:1334_19: Taṃ rukkhamūlaṃ paviṭṭhamattaṃyeva yakkho bheravaṃ attabhāvaṃ nimminitvā mūlakandaṃ viya khādi.
atk-s0301a:1334_20: Yakkhānubhāvena kira manussānaṃ kesādīni upādāya sakalasarīraṃ navanītapiṇḍaṃ viya hoti,
atk-s0301a:1334_21: yakkhassa bhattaṃ gāhāpetuṃ gatapurisā taṃ disvā bhītā yathāmittaṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0301a:1334_22: Tato pabhuti “rājā core gahetvā yakkhassa detī”ti manussā corakammato paṭiviratā.
atk-s0301a:1334_23: Tato aparena samayena navacorānaṃ abhāvena purāṇacorānañca parikkhayena bandhanāgārāni suññāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0301a:1335_1: Rājā attano dhanaṃ nagararacchāsu chaḍḍāpesi “appeva nāma koci lobhena gaṇheyyā”ti.
atk-s0301a:1335_6: Rājā “amhākaṃ pitaraṃ amhākaṃ pitāmahaṃ pesetīti manussā khobhaṃ karissanti,
atk-s0301a:1335_7: mā vo etaṃ ruccī”ti vāresi. “Tena hi, deva,
atk-s0301a:1335_9: tathāvidhassa hi ‘mātā me’ti ‘pitā me’ti sineho natthī”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0301a:1335_12: Nagare dārakamātaro ca dārake gahetvā gabbhiniyo ca palāyitvā parajanapade dārake saṃvaḍḍhetvā ānenti.
atk-s0301a:1336_0: Tato ekadivasaṃ sakalanagaraṃ vicinitvā ekampi dārakaṃ alabhitvā amaccā rañño ārocesuṃ – “natthi, deva,
atk-s0301a:1336_1: nagare dārako ṭhapetvā antepure tava puttaṃ āḷavakakumāra”nti.
atk-s0301a:1336_5: gacchatha tampi datvā mama jīvitaṃ rakkhathā”ti.
atk-s0301a:1336_6: Tena ca samayena āḷavakassa mātā puttaṃ nhāpetvā maṇḍetvā dukūlacumbaṭake katvā aṅke sayāpetvā nisinnā hoti.
atk-s0301a:1336_7: Rājapurisā rañño āṇāya tattha gantvā vippalapantiyā tassā soḷasannañca devisahassānaṃ saddhiṃ dhātiyā taṃ ādāya pakkamiṃsu,
atk-s0301a:1336_9: Taṃdivasañca bhagavā paccūsasamayaṃ paccuṭṭhāya jetavanavihāre gandhakuṭiyaṃ mahākaruṇāsamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā
atk-s0301a:1336_10: buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ olokento addasa āḷavakassa kumārassa anāgāmiphaluppattiyā upanissayaṃ yakkhassa
atk-s0301a:1336_13: So vibhātāya rattiyā purimabhattakiccaṃ katvā suniṭṭhitapacchābhattakicco kāḷapakkhūposathadivase vattamāne
atk-s0301a:1336_14: oggate sūriye eko adutiyo pattacīvaramādāya pādamaggeneva sāvatthito tiṃsa yojanāni gantvā tassa yakkhassa
atk-s0301a:1337_0: Kiṃ pana bhagavā yasmiṃ nigrodhe āḷavakassa bhavanaṃ,
atk-s0301a:1337_4: Yatheva hi yakkhā attano bhavanaṃ passanti,
atk-s0301a:1337_7: Tadā āḷavako himavante yakkhasamāgamaṃ gato hoti.
atk-s0301a:1337_8: Tato āḷavakassa dvārapālo gadrabho nāma yakkho bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā, “kiṃ, bhante,
atk-s0301a:1337_9: bhagavā vikāle āgato”ti āha. Āma, gadrabha, āgatomhi,
atk-s0301a:1337_11: vihareyyāmekarattaṃ āḷavakassa bhavaneti. Na me, bhante, garu,
atk-s0301a:1337_12: apica kho so yakkho kakkhaḷo pharuso,
atk-s0301a:1337_14: mā rucci bhagavato idha vāsoti. Jānāmi, gadrabha,
atk-s0301a:1338_2: mātāpitaroti vā samaṇabrāhmaṇāti vā dhammoti vā na jānāti,
atk-s0301a:1338_5: pādepi gahetvā parasamuddaṃ vā paracakkavāḷaṃ vā khipatī”ti.
atk-s0301a:1338_9: apica kho so yakkho attano anārocetvā anujānantaṃ maṃ jīvitāpi voropeyya, ārocemi, bhante, tassāti.
atk-s0301a:1338_12: tvameva jānāhī”ti bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā himavantābhimukho pakkāmi.
atk-s0301a:1338_14: Bhagavā antobhavanaṃ pavisitvā yattha abhilakkhitesu maṅgaladivasādīsu nisīditvā āḷavako siriṃ anubhoti,
atk-s0301a:1338_15: tasmiṃyeva dibbaratanamaye pallaṅke nisīditvā suvaṇṇābhaṃ muñci.
atk-s0301a:1338_16: Taṃ disvā yakkhassa itthiyo āgantvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā samparivāretvā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0301a:1338_17: Bhagavā “pubbe tumhe dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā pūjaneyyaṃ pūjetvā imaṃ sampattiṃ pattā,
atk-s0301a:1338_19: mā aññamaññaṃ issāmacchariyābhibhūtā viharathā”tiādinā nayena tāsaṃ pakiṇṇakadhammakathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0301a:1338_20: Tā bhagavato madhuranigghosaṃ sutvā sādhukārasahassāni datvā bhagavantaṃ samparivāretvā nisīdiṃsuyeva.
atk-s0301a:1339_0: Tadā sātāgirahemavatā bhagavantaṃ jetavaneyeva vanditvā “yakkhasamāgamaṃ gamissāmā”ti saparivārā nānāyānehi ākāsena gacchanti.
atk-s0301a:1339_1: Ākāse ca yakkhānaṃ sabbattha maggo natthi,
atk-s0301a:1339_2: ākāsaṭṭhāni vimānāni pariharitvā maggaṭṭhāneneva maggo hoti.
atk-s0301a:1339_3: Āḷavakassa pana vimānaṃ bhūmaṭṭhaṃ suguttaṃ pākāraparikkhittaṃ susaṃvihitadvāraaṭṭālakagopuraṃ upari
atk-s0301a:1339_7: Buddhānaṃ hi nisinnokāsassa uparibhāgena yāva bhavaggā koci gantuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0301a:1339_9: Āvajjetvā bhagavantaṃ disvā ākāse khittaleḍḍu viya oruyha vanditvā dhammaṃ sutvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā,
atk-s0301a:1339_10: “yakkhasamāgamaṃ gacchāma bhagavā”ti tīṇi vatthūni pasaṃsantā yakkhasamāgamaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0301a:1339_22: “ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā āḷaviyaṃ viharati āḷavakassa yakkhassa bhavane”ti.
atk-s0301a:1340_6: ayaṃ hi yasmā assaddhassa saddhākathā dukkathā hoti dussīlādīnaṃ sīlādikathā viya,
atk-s0301a:1340_7: tasmā tesaṃ yakkhānaṃ santikā bhagavato pasaṃsaṃ sutvāyeva aggimhi pakkhittaloṇasakkharā viya abbhantare
atk-s0301a:1340_8: kopena taṭataṭāyamānahadayo hutvā “ko so bhagavā nāma,
atk-s0301a:1340_12: yo tusitabhavane ṭhito pañcamahāvilokitaṃ viloketvā”tiādinā nayena yāva dhammacakkapavattanā kathentā paṭisandhiādīsu dvattiṃsa pubbanimittāni vatvā,
atk-s0301a:1340_18: ko tayā attho passatā vā apassatā vā?
atk-s0301a:1340_27: Evaṃ vutte duṭṭho āḷavako uṭṭhahitvā manosilātale vāmapādena ṭhatvā –
atk-s0301a:1340_29: ahaṃ vā”ti dakkhiṇapādena saṭṭhiyojanamattaṃ kelāsapabbatakūṭaṃ akkami.
atk-s0301a:1340_30: Taṃ ayokūṭapahaṭo viya niddhantaayopiṇḍo papaṭikāyo muñci,
atk-s0301a:1341_1: yañca puṇṇako yakkhasenāpati dhanañjayakorabyarājānaṃ jūtaṃ jinitvā apphoṭetvā “ahaṃ jini”nti ugghosesi;
atk-s0301a:1341_2: yañca sakko devānamindo kassapabhagavato sāsane osakkante vissakammadevaputtaṃ sunakhaṃ karitvā –
atk-s0301a:1341_3: “ahaṃ pāpabhikkhū ca pāpabhikkhuniyo ca upāsake ca upāsikāyo ca sabbeva ca adhammavādino khādāmī”ti ugghosāpesi;
atk-s0301a:1341_4: yañca kusajātake pabhāvatihetu sattahi rājūhi nagare uparuddhe pabhāvatiṃ attanā saha hatthikkhandhe āropetvā nagarā nikkhamma –
atk-s0301a:1341_7: Tadā hi sakalajambudīpe dvāre ṭhatvā ugghositasadisaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0301a:1342_2: Te puratthimādibhedā vātā samuṭṭhahitvā aḍḍhayojanayojanadviyojanatiyojanappamāṇāni pabbatakūṭāni padāletvā vanagaccharukkhādīni ummūlaṃ katvā,
atk-s0301a:1342_3: āḷavinagaraṃ pakkhantā jiṇṇahatthisālādīni cuṇṇentā chadaniṭṭhakā ākāse vidhamentā.
atk-s0301a:1342_5: Te vātā dasabalaṃ patvā cīvarakaṇṇamattampi cāletuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu.
atk-s0301a:1342_8: Tassānubhāvena uparūpari satapaṭalasahassapaṭalādibhedā valāhakā uṭṭhahitvā pavassiṃsu.
atk-s0301a:1342_10: Vanarukkhādīnaṃ upari mahogho āgantvā dasabalassa cīvare ussāvabindumattampi temetuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0301a:1342_12: Mahantāni mahantāni pabbatakūṭāni dhūmāyantāni pajjalantāni ākāsenāgantvā dasabalaṃ patvā dibbamālāguḷāni sampajjiṃsu.
atk-s0301a:1342_14: Ekatodhārāubhatodhārāasisattikhurappādayo dhūmāyantā pajjalantā ākāsenāgantvā dasabalaṃ patvā dibbapupphāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0301a:1342_16: Kiṃsuka vaṇṇā aṅgārā ākāsenāgantvā dasabalassa pādamūle dibbapupphāni hutvā vikīrayiṃsu.
atk-s0301a:1342_18: Accuṇhā kukkulā ākāsenāgantvā dasabalassa pādamūle candanacuṇṇaṃ hutvā nipatiṃsu.
atk-s0301a:1342_20: Atisukhumavālikā dhūmāyantā pajjalantā ākāsenāgantvā dasabalassa pādamūle dibbapupphāni hutvā nipatiṃsu.
atk-s0301a:1342_22: Taṃ kalalavassaṃ dhūmāyantaṃ pajjalantaṃ ākāsenāgantvā dasabalassa pādamūle dibbagandhaṃ hutvā nipati.
atk-s0301a:1342_24: Taṃ caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ andhakārasadisaṃ hutvā dasabalaṃ patvā sūriyappabhāvihatamiva andhakāraṃ antaradhāyi.
atk-s0301a:1343_1: palāpetuṃ asakkonto nānāvidhapaharaṇahatthāya anekappakārarūpabhūtagaṇasamākulāya caturaṅginiyā senāya
atk-s0301a:1343_3: Te bhūtagaṇā anekappakāre vikāre katvā “gaṇhatha hanathā”ti bhagavato upari āgacchantā viya honti.
atk-s0301a:1343_6: Evaṃ santepi yathā bodhimaṇḍe māro āgatavelāyameva nivatto,
atk-s0301a:1343_8: Evaṃ upaḍḍharattimattaṃ anekappakāravibhiṃsanakadassanenapi bhagavantaṃ cāletuṃ asakkonto āḷavako cintesi –
atk-s0301a:1344_5: Yadi hi sakko duṭṭho vajirāvudhaṃ sinerumatthake pahareyya,
atk-s0301a:1344_7: Vessavaṇena kujjhanakāle vissajjitaṃ gadāvudhaṃ bahūnaṃ yakkhasahassānaṃ sīsaṃ pātetvā puna hatthapāsaṃ āgantvā tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0301a:1344_8: Yamena duṭṭhena nayanāvudhena olokitamatte anekāni kumbhaṇḍasahassāni tattakapāle tilā viya pharantāni vinassanti.
atk-s0301a:1344_9: Āḷavako duṭṭho sace ākāse dussāvudhaṃ muñceyya,
atk-s0301a:1344_12: Sabbarukkhatiṇādīni sussitvā dvādasavassantare na puna viruheyyuṃ.
atk-s0301a:1344_17: So evaṃ mahānubhāvaṃ dussāvudhaṃ uttarisāṭakaṃ muñcitvā aggahesi.
atk-s0301a:1344_18: Yebhuyyena dasasahassīlokadhātudevatā vegena sannipatiṃsu “ajja bhagavā āḷavakaṃ damessati,
atk-s0301a:1344_19: tattha dhammaṃ sossāmā”ti yuddhadassanakāmāpi devatā sannipatiṃsu.
atk-s0301a:1345_0: Atha āḷavako bhagavato samīpe uparūpari vicaritvā vatthāvudhaṃ muñci.
atk-s0301a:1345_1: Taṃ asanivicakkaṃ viya ākāse bheravasaddaṃ karontaṃ dhūmāyantaṃ pajjalantaṃ bhagavantaṃ patvā yakkhamānamaddanatthaṃ
atk-s0301a:1345_3: Āḷavako taṃ disvā chinnavisāṇo viya usabho uddhatadāṭho viya sappo nittejo nimmado nipatitamānaddhajo hutvā cintesi –
atk-s0301a:1345_8: handa naṃ rosetvā mettāya viyojemī”ti iminā sambandhenetaṃ vuttaṃ –
atk-s0301a:1345_9: atha kho āḷavako yakkho yena bhagavā…pe…
atk-s0301a:1345_12: kasmā mayā ananuññāto mama bhavanaṃ pavisitvā gharasāmiko viya itthāgārassa majjhe nisinnosi?
atk-s0301a:1345_13: Ananuyuttametaṃ samaṇassa yadidaṃ adinnaparibhogo itthisaṃsaggo ca?
atk-s0301a:1345_17: “etāni aññāni ca pharusavacanāni vatvā evāyaṃ etadavocā”ti bhaṇanti.
atk-s0301a:1346_3: seyyathāpi caṇḍassa kukkurassa nāsāya pittaṃ bhindeyya,
atk-s0301a:1346_6: mudunā pana so sakkā vinetu”nti ñatvā,
atk-s0301a:1346_7: sādhāvusoti piyavacanena tassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā nikkhami.
atk-s0301a:1347_2: evaṃ nāma nikkhametuṃ sukhaṃ samaṇaṃ akāraṇenevāhaṃ sakalarattiṃ yuddhena abbhuyyāsi”nti muducitto hutvā puna cintesi –
atk-s0301a:1347_4: kiṃ nu kho subbacatāya nikkhanto udāhu kodhano.
atk-s0301a:1347_8: Atha subbacoti mudubhūtacittavavatthānakaraṇatthaṃ puna piyavacanaṃ vadanto sādhāvusoti bhagavā pāvisi.
atk-s0301a:1347_9: Āḷavako punappunaṃ tameva subbacabhāvaṃ vīmaṃsanto dutiyampi tatiyampi nikkhama pavisāti āha.
atk-s0301a:1347_12: pakatiyāpi thaddhayakkhassa cittaṃ thaddhataraṃ hutvā dhammakathāya bhājanaṃ na bhaveyya.
atk-s0301a:1347_13: Tasmā yathā nāma mātā rodantaṃ puttakaṃ yaṃ so icchati,
atk-s0301a:1347_14: taṃ datvā vā katvā vā saññāpesi tathā bhagavā kilesarodanena rodantaṃ yakkhaṃ saññāpetuṃ yaṃ so bhaṇati,
atk-s0301a:1347_16: Yathā ca dhātī thaññaṃ apivantaṃ dārakaṃ kiñci datvā upalāḷetvā pāyeti,
atk-s0301a:1347_17: tathā bhagavā yakkhaṃ lokuttaradhammakhīraṃ pāyetuṃ tassa patthitavacanakaraṇena upalāḷento evamakāsi.
atk-s0301a:1347_18: Yathā ca puriso lābumhi catumadhuraṃ pūretukāmo tassabbhantaraṃ sodheti,
atk-s0301a:1347_19: evaṃ bhagavā yakkhassa citte lokuttaracatumadhuraṃ pūretukāmo tassabbhantare kodhamalaṃ sodhetuṃ yāva tatiyaṃ nikkhamanapavisanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0301a:1348_0: Atha āḷavako “subbaco ayaṃ samaṇo ‘nikkhamā’ti vutto nikkhamati,
atk-s0301a:1348_2: Yaṃnūnāhaṃ imaṃ samaṇaṃ evameva sakalarattiṃ kilametvā pāde gahetvā pāragaṅgāya khipeyya”nti?
atk-s0301a:1348_3: Pāpakaṃ cittaṃ uppādetvā catutthavāraṃ āha nikkhama, samaṇāti.
atk-s0301a:1348_4: Taṃ ñatvā bhagavā na khvāhaṃ tanti āha.
atk-s0301a:1348_5: Evaṃ vā vutte taduttarikaraṇīyaṃ pariyesamāno pañhaṃ pucchitabbaṃ maññissati.
atk-s0301a:1349_0: Tato āḷavako yasmā pubbepi ākāsena gamanavelāya –
atk-s0301a:1349_3: handa naṃ passāmā”ti evaṃ attano vimānaṃ āgate iddhimante tāpasaparibbājake pañhaṃ pucchitvā vissajjetuṃ asakkonte cittakkhepādīhi viheṭheti,
atk-s0301a:1349_4: tasmā bhagavantampi tathā viheṭhessāmīti maññamāno pañhaṃ tantiādimāha.
atk-s0301a:1350_1: Tassa kira mātāpitaro kassapaṃ bhagavantaṃ payirupāsitvā aṭṭha pañhe saha vissajjanena uggahesuṃ.
atk-s0301a:1350_4: Tato “ime pañhāpi mā vinassantū”ti suvaṇṇapaṭṭhe jātihiṅgulakena lekhāpetvā vimāne nikkhipi.
atk-s0301a:1350_6: Bhagavā taṃ sutvā yasmā buddhānaṃ pariccattalābhantarāyo vā jīvitantarāyo vā sabbaññutaññāṇabyāmappabhādipaṭighāto vā na sakkā kenaci kātuṃ,
atk-s0301a:1350_7: tasmā naṃ loke asādhāraṇaṃ buddhānubhāvaṃ dassento na khvāhaṃ taṃ, āvuso,
atk-s0301a:1351_0: Evaṃ bhagavā tassa bādhanacittaṃ paṭisedhetvā pañhāpucchane ussāhaṃ janento āha apica tvaṃ, āvuso, puccha,
atk-s0301a:1351_7: Sabbaṃ te vissajjessāmīti sabbaññupavāraṇaṃ pavāresi asādhāraṇaṃ paccekabuddhaaggasāvakamahāsāvakehi.
atk-s0301a:1351_8: Evaṃ bhagavato sabbaññupavāraṇāya pavāritāya atha kho āḷavako yakkho bhagavantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi.
atk-s0301a:1352_7: Āvahātīti āvahati āneti deti appeti. Have-
atk-s0301a:1352_17: Evaṃ imāya gāthāya “kiṃ su idha loke purisassa vittaṃ seṭṭhaṃ?
atk-s0301a:1353_0: Athassa bhagavā kassapadasabalena vissajjitanayeneva vissajjento imaṃ gāthamāha saddhīdha vittanti.
atk-s0301a:1353_1: Tattha yathā hiraññasuvaṇṇādi vittaṃ upabhogasukhaṃ āvahati,
atk-s0301a:1353_6: evaṃ lokiyalokuttarā saddhāpi yathāsambhavaṃ lokiyalokuttaraṃ vipākaṃ sukhamāvahati,
atk-s0301a:1355_0: Yaṃ yaṃ padesaṃ bhajati, tattha tattheva pūjito”ti. –
atk-s0301a:1356_1: Yasmā pana tesaṃ saddhāvittaṃ anugāmikaṃ anaññasādhāraṇaṃ sabbasampattihetu,
atk-s0301a:1356_3: Saddhoyeva hi dānādīni puññāni katvā vittaṃ adhigacchati,
atk-s0301a:1356_4: assaddhassa pana vittaṃ yāvadeva anatthāya hoti,
atk-s0301a:1358_0: Saccanti ayaṃ saccasaddo anekesu atthesu dissati.
atk-s0301a:1358_11: Idha pana paramatthasaccaṃ nibbānaṃ viratisaccañca abbhantaraṃ katvā vācāsaccaṃ adhippetaṃ,
atk-s0301a:1367_1: Rasānanti ye ime “mūlaraso khandharaso”tiādinā nayena sāyanīyadhammā,
atk-s0301a:1367_5: arasarūpo bhavaṃ gotamo, ye te, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0301a:1367_9: bhāgī vā bhagavā attharasassa dhammarasassā”tiādinā nayena rūpācārarasupavajjā avasesā byañjanādayo “dhammarasā”ti vuccanti.
atk-s0301a:1367_10: Tesaṃ rasānaṃ saccaṃ have sādutaraṃ saccameva sādutaraṃ.
atk-s0301a:1367_19: attharasadhammarasā ca tadadhigamūpāyabhūtaṃ atthañca dhammañca nissāya pavattitoti.
atk-s0301a:1368_0: Paññājīviṃjīvitanti ettha pana yvāyaṃ andhekacakkhudvicakkhukesu dvicakkhupuggalo gahaṭṭho vā kammantānuṭṭhāna-
atk-s0301a:1368_4: pabbajito vā avippaṭisārakarasīlasaṅkhātaṃ taduttaricittavisuddhiādibhedampi pabbajitapaṭipadaṃ paññāya ārādhetvā jīvati,
atk-s0301a:1368_6: taṃ vā paññājīvitaṃ seṭṭhamāhūti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0301a:1369_0: Evaṃ bhagavatā vissajjite cattāropi pañhe sutvā attamano yakkho avasesepi cattāro pañhe pucchanto kathaṃsu tarati oghanti gāthamāha.
atk-s0301a:1369_1: Athassa bhagavā purimanayeneva vissajjento saddhāya taratīti gāthamāha.
atk-s0301a:1369_6: evaṃ santepi pana yasmā assaddho oghataraṇaṃ asaddahanto na pakkhandati,
atk-s0301a:1369_7: pañcasu kāmaguṇesu cittavossaggena pamatto tattheva visattattā saṃsāraṇṇavaṃ na tarati,
atk-s0301a:1369_8: kusīto dukkhaṃ viharati vokiṇṇo akusalehi dhammehi,
atk-s0301a:1369_10: tasmā tappaṭipakkhaṃ dassentena bhagavatā ayaṃ gāthā vuttā.
atk-s0301a:1370_0: Evaṃ vuttāya cetāya yasmā sotāpattiyaṅgapadaṭṭhānaṃ saddhindriyaṃ,
atk-s0301a:1370_1: tasmā saddhāya tarati oghanti iminā padena diṭṭhoghataraṇaṃ sotāpattimaggaṃ sotāpannañca pakāseti.
atk-s0301a:1370_2: Yasmā pana sotāpanno kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ bhāvanāya sātaccakiriyasaṅkhatena appamādena samannāgato dutiyamaggaṃ
atk-s0301a:1370_3: ārādhetvā ṭhapetvā sakidevimaṃ lokaṃ āgamanamaggaṃ avasesaṃ sotāpattimaggena atiṇṇaṃ bhavoghavatthuṃ
atk-s0301a:1370_5: tasmā appamādena aṇṇavanti iminā padena bhavoghataraṇaṃ sakadāgāmimaggaṃ sakadāgāmiñca pakāseti.
atk-s0301a:1370_6: Yasmā ca sakadāgāmī vīriyena tatiyamaggaṃ ārādhetvā sakadāgāmimaggena anatītaṃ kāmoghavatthuṃ kāmoghasaññitañca kāmadukkhamacceti,
atk-s0301a:1370_7: tasmā vīriyena dukkhamaccetīti iminā padena kāmoghataraṇaṃ anāgāmimaggaṃ anāgāmiñca pakāseti.
atk-s0301a:1370_8: Yasmā pana anāgāmī vigatakāmasaññāya parisuddhāya paññāya ekantaparisuddhaṃ catutthamaggapaññaṃ ārādhetvā
atk-s0301a:1370_11: iminā padena avijjoghataraṇaṃ arahattamaggañca arahattañca pakāseti.
atk-s0301a:1370_12: Imāya ca arahattanikūṭena kathitāya gāthāya pariyosāne yakkho sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0301a:1371_0: Idāni tameva “paññāya parisujjhatī”ti ettha vuttaṃ paññāpadaṃ gahetvā attano paṭibhānena lokiyalokuttaramissakaṃ
atk-s0301a:1371_1: pañhaṃ pucchanto kathaṃsu labhate paññanti imaṃ chappadaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0301a:1371_3: Ayaṃ hi paññādiatthaṃ ñatvā tassa yuttiṃ pucchati – “kathaṃ,
atk-s0301a:1372_0: Athassa bhagavā catūhi kāraṇehi paññālābhaṃ dassento saddahānotiādimāha.
atk-s0301a:1372_2: yena pubbabhāge kāyasucaritādibhedena aparabhāge ca sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyabhedena dhammena arahanto buddhapaccekabuddhasāvakā nibbānaṃ pattā,
atk-s0301a:1372_3: taṃ saddahāno arahataṃ dhammaṃ nibbānapattiyā lokiyalokuttarapaññaṃ labhati,
atk-s0301a:1372_9: tasmā upasaṅkamanato pabhuti yāva dhammassavanena sussūsaṃ labhati.
atk-s0301a:1372_11: taṃ dhammaṃ saddahitvāpi ācariyupajjhāye kālena upasaṅkamitvā vattakaraṇena payirupāsitvā yadā payirupāsanāya ārādhitacittā kiñci vattukāmā honti.
atk-s0301a:1372_12: Atha adhigatāya sotukāmatāya sotaṃ odahitvā suṇanto labhatīti.
atk-s0301a:1372_13: Evaṃ sussūsampi ca satiavippavāsena appamatto subhāsitadubbhāsitaññutāya vicakkhaṇo eva labhati, na itaro.
atk-s0301a:1373_0: Evaṃ yasmā saddhāya paññalābhasaṃvattanikaṃ paṭipadaṃ paṭipajjati,
atk-s0301a:1373_3: Vicakkhaṇatāya anūnādhikaṃ aviparītañca gahetvā vitthārikaṃ karoti.
atk-s0301a:1373_4: Sussūsāya vā ohitasoto paññāpaṭilābhahetuṃ dhammaṃ suṇāti,
atk-s0301a:1373_8: tasmāssa bhagavā “kathaṃsu labhate pañña”nti puṭṭho imāni cattāri kāraṇāni dassento imaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0301a:1374_0: Idāni tato pare tayo pañhe vissajjento patirūpakārīti imaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0301a:1374_1: Tattha desakālādīni ahāpetvā lokiyassa lokuttarassa vā dhanassa patirūpaṃ adhigamūpāyaṃ karotīti patirūpakārī.
atk-s0301a:1374_5: tiṇā bhiyyo na maññatī”tiādinā nayena kāyikavīrīyavasena uṭṭhānasampanno asithilaparakkamo.
atk-s0301a:1374_6: Vindate dhananti ekamūsikāya nacirasseva catusatasahassasaṅkhaṃ cūḷantevāsī viya lokiyadhanañca,
atk-s0301a:1374_8: So “tīhiyeva iriyāpathehi viharissāmī”ti vattaṃ katvā thinamiddhāgamanavelāya palālacumbaṭakaṃ temetvā
atk-s0301a:1374_9: sīse katvā galappamāṇaṃ udakaṃ pavisitvā thinamiddhaṃ paṭibāhanto dasahi vassehi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0301a:1374_11: paramatthasaccenāpi “buddho paccekabuddho ariyasāvako”ti evaṃ kittiṃ pappoti.
atk-s0301a:1374_12: Dadanti yaṃkiñci icchitapatthitaṃ dadanto mittāni ganthati,
atk-s0301a:1374_15: Dānamukhena vā cattāripi saṅgahavatthūni gahitānīti veditabbāni,
atk-s0301a:1375_0: Evaṃ gahaṭṭhapabbajitānaṃ sādhāraṇena lokiyalokuttaramissakena nayena cattāro pañhe vissajjetvā idāni
atk-s0301a:1375_1: “kathaṃ pecca na socatī”ti imaṃ pañcamaṃ pañhaṃ gahaṭṭhavasena vissajjento yassetetiādīmāha.
atk-s0301a:1375_3: yassa “saddahāno arahata”nti ettha vuttāya sabbakalyāṇadhammuppādikāya saddhāya samannāgatattā saddhassa,
atk-s0301a:1375_4: gharamesinoti gharāvāsaṃ pañca vā kāmaguṇe esantassa gavesantassa kāmabhogino gahaṭṭhassa “saccena kittiṃ pappotī”ti ettha vuttappakāraṃ saccaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1375_5: “Sussūsaṃ labhate pañña”nti ettha sussūsapaññānāmena vuttova damo.
atk-s0301a:1375_6: “Dhuravā uṭṭhātā”ti ettha dhuranāmena uṭṭhānanāmena ca vuttā dhiti.
atk-s0301a:1375_7: “Dadaṃ mittāni ganthatī”ti ettha vuttappakāro cāgo cāti ete caturo dhammā santi.
atk-s0301a:1375_8: Sa ve pecca na socatīti idhalokā paralokaṃ gantvā sa ve na socatīti.
atk-s0301a:1376_0: Evaṃ bhagavā pañcamampi pañhaṃ vissajjetvā taṃ yakkhaṃ codento iṅgha aññepītiādimāha.
atk-s0301a:1376_2: Aññepīti aññepi dhamme puthū samaṇabrāhmaṇe pucchassu.
atk-s0301a:1376_3: Aññepi vā pūraṇādayo sabbaññupaṭiññe puthū samaṇabrāhmaṇe pucchassu.
atk-s0301a:1376_4: Yadi amhehi “saccena kittiṃ pappotī”ti ettha vuttappakārā saccā bhiyyo kittippattikāraṇaṃ vā,
atk-s0301a:1376_5: “sussūsaṃ labhate pañña”nti ettha sussūsāti paññāpadesena vuttā dammā bhiyyo lokiyalokuttarapaññāpaṭilābhakāraṇaṃ vā,
atk-s0301a:1376_6: “dadaṃ mittāni ganthatī”ti ettha vuttappakārā cāgā bhiyyo mittaganthanakāraṇaṃ vā,
atk-s0301a:1376_7: “dhuravā uṭṭhātā”ti ettha taṃ taṃ atthavasaṃ paṭicca dhuranāmena uṭṭhānanāmena ca vuttāya mahābhārasahanatthena
atk-s0301a:1376_8: ussoḷhibhāvappattāya vīriyasaṅkhātāya khantyā bhiyyo lokiyalokuttaradhanavindanakāraṇaṃ vā,
atk-s0301a:1376_9: “saccaṃ dammo dhiti cāgo”ti evaṃ vuttehi imeheva catūhi dhammehi bhiyyo asmā lokā paraṃ lokaṃ pecca asocanakāraṇaṃ
atk-s0301a:1376_10: vā idha vijjatīti ayamettha saddhiṃ saṅkhepayojanāya atthavaṇṇanā.
atk-s0301a:1376_11: Vitthārato pana ekamekaṃ padaṃ atthuddhārapaduddhārapadavaṇṇanānayehi vibhajitvā veditabbā.
atk-s0301a:1377_0: Evaṃ vutte yakkho yena saṃsayena aññe puccheyya,
atk-s0301a:1377_1: tassa pahīnattā kathaṃ nu dāni puccheyyaṃ,
atk-s0301a:1377_2: puthū samaṇabrāhmaṇeti vatvā yepissa apucchanakāraṇaṃ na jānanti,
atk-s0301a:1377_7: Yo atthoti ettāvatā “sussūsaṃ labhate pañña”ntiādinā nayena vuttaṃ diṭṭhadhammikaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0301a:1377_8: Samparāyikoti iminā “yassete caturo dhammā”ti vuttaṃ pecca sokābhāvakāraṇaṃ samparāyikaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1377_10: Ayaṃ hi atthasaddo “sātthaṃ sabyañjana”nti evamādīsu pāṭhatthe vattati.
atk-s0301a:1377_20: taṃ yohaṃ ajja bhagavatā vuttanayena sāmaṃyeva pajānāmi,
atk-s0301a:1377_21: so kathaṃ nu dāni puccheyyaṃ puthū samaṇabrāhmaṇeti evamettha saṅkhepato attho veditabbo.
atk-s0301a:1378_0: Evaṃ yakkho “pajānāmi yo attho samparāyiko”ti vatvā tassa ñāṇassa bhagavaṃmūlakattaṃ dassento atthāya vata me buddhoti āha.
atk-s0301a:1378_2: Yattha dinnaṃ mahapphalanti “yassete caturo dhammā”ti ettha vuttacāgena yattha dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ,
atk-s0301a:1379_0: Evaṃ imāya gāthāya attano hitādhigamaṃ dassetvā idāni sahitapaṭipattiṃ dīpento so ahaṃ vicarissāmītiādimāha.
atk-s0301a:1379_5: svākkhāto vata bhagavato dhammo”tiādinā nayena buddhasubodhitañca dhammasudhammatañca ca-
atk-s0301a:1379_6: saddena “suppaṭipanno vata bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho”tiādinā saṅghasuppaṭipattiñca abhitthavitvā namassamāno
atk-s0301a:1380_0: Evamimāya gāthāya pariyosānañca rattivibhāvanañca sādhukārasadduṭṭhānañca āḷavakakumārassa yakkhabhavanaṃ ānayanañca ekakkhaṇeyeva ahosi.
atk-s0301a:1380_2: “evarūpo sādhukārasaddo ṭhapetvā buddhe na aññesaṃ abbhuggacchati,
atk-s0301a:1380_3: āgato nu kho bhagavā”ti āvajjentā bhagavato sarīrappabhaṃ disvā pubbe viya bahi aṭṭhatvā nibbisaṅkā antoyeva
atk-s0301a:1380_4: pavisitvā addasaṃsu bhagavantaṃ yakkhassa bhavane nisinnaṃ,
atk-s0301a:1380_9: handa naṃ khāda vā bhuñja vā,
atk-s0301a:1380_11: So sotāpannattā lajjito visesena ca bhagavato purato evaṃ vuccamāno atha taṃ kumāraṃ ubhohi hatthehi paṭiggahetvā bhagavato upanāmesi “ayaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0301a:1380_16: bhagavā imaṃ dārakaṃ imassa hitatthāya sukhatthāyā”ti imañca gāthamāha –
atk-s0301a:1385_1: Paṭiggaṇhanto ca yakkhassa ca kumārassa ca maṅgalakaraṇatthaṃ pādūnagāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0301a:1385_2: Taṃ yakkho kumāraṃ saraṇaṃ gamento tikkhattuṃ catutthapādena pūresi.
atk-s0301a:1392_2: Evaṃ so kumāro rājapurisānaṃ hatthato yakkhassa hatthaṃ,
atk-s0301a:1392_4: bhagavato hatthato puna rājapurisānaṃ hatthaṃ gatattā nāmato “hatthako āḷavako”ti jāto.
atk-s0301a:1392_5: Taṃ ādāya paṭinivatte rājapurise disvā kassakavanakammikādayo “kiṃ yakkho kumāraṃ atidaharattā na icchī”ti?
atk-s0301a:1392_9: Tato “sādhu sādhū”ti sakalaṃ āḷavinagaraṃ ekakolāhalena yakkhābhimukhaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0301a:1392_10: Yakkhopi bhagavato bhikkhācārakāle anuppatte pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā upaḍḍhamaggaṃ anugantvā nivatti.
atk-s0301a:1393_0: Atha bhagavā nagare piṇḍāya caritvā katabhattakicco nagaradvāre aññatarasmiṃ vivitte rukkhamūle paññattabuddhāsane nisīdi.
atk-s0301a:1393_1: Tato mahājanakāyena saddhiṃ rājā ca nāgarā ca ekato sampiṇḍitvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamma vanditvā parivāretvā nisinnā – “kathaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0301a:1393_3: Tesaṃ bhagavā yuddhamādiṃ katvā “evaṃ navavidhaṃ vassaṃ vassetvā evaṃ vibhiṃsanakaṃ akāsi,
atk-s0301a:1393_7: Tato rājā ceva nāgarā ca vessavaṇamahārājassa bhavanasamīpe yakkhassa bhavanaṃ katvā pupphagandhādisakkārupetaṃ niccabaliṃ pavattesuṃ.
atk-s0301a:1393_8: Tañca kumāraṃ viññutaṃ pattaṃ “tvaṃ bhagavantaṃ nissāya jīvitaṃ labhi,
atk-s0301a:1393_10: So bhagavantañca bhikkhusaṅghañca payirupāsamāno nacirasseva anāgāmiphale patiṭṭhāya sabbaṃ buddhavacanaṃ uggahetvā pañcasataupāsakaparivāro ahosi.
atk-s0301a:1393_14: mama sāvakānaṃ upāsakānaṃ catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi parisaṃ saṅgaṇhantānaṃ yadidaṃ hatthako āḷavako”ti.
atk-s0301a:1400_4: sakko kira magadharaṭṭhe macalagāmake magho nāma māṇavo hutvā tettiṃsa purise gahetvā kalyāṇakammaṃ karonto
atk-s0301a:1400_5: satta vatapadāni pūretvā tattha kālaṅkato devaloke nibbatti.
atk-s0301a:1400_6: Taṃ balavakammānubhāvena saparisaṃ sesadevatā dasahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhantaṃ disvā “āgantukadevaputtā āgatā”ti nevāsikā gandhapānaṃ sajjayiṃsu.
atk-s0301a:1400_11: Nevāsikadevatā suvaṇṇasarakehi upanītaṃ gandhapānaṃ yāvadatthaṃ pivitvā mattā tattha tattha suvaṇṇapathaviyaṃ patitvā sayiṃsu.
atk-s0301a:1400_12: Sakko “gaṇhatha puttahatāya putte”ti te pādesu gahetvā sinerupāde khipāpesi.
atk-s0301a:1400_13: Sakkassa puññatejena tadanuvattakāpi sabbe tattheva patiṃsu.
atk-s0301a:1400_18: Atha nesaṃ kammapaccayautusamuṭṭhānaṃ sinerussa heṭṭhimatale dasayojanasahassaṃ asurabhavanaṃ nibbatti.
atk-s0301a:1400_19: Sakko tesaṃ nivattetvā anāgamanatthāya ārakkhaṃ ṭhapesi,
atk-s0301a:1405_0: Dve nagarāni hi yuddhena gahetuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya ayujjhapurāni nāma jātāni devanagarañca asuranagarañca.
atk-s0301a:1405_2: atha devehi palāyitvā devanagaraṃ pavisitvā dvāre pidahite asurānaṃ satasahassampi kiñci kātuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0301a:1405_4: athāsurehi palāyitvā asuranagarassa dvāre pidahite sakkānaṃ satasahassampi kiñci kātuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0301a:1405_5: Iti imāni dve nagarāni ayujjhapurāni nāma.
atk-s0301a:1405_6: Nesaṃ antarā etesu udakādīsu pañcasu ṭhānesu sakkena ārakkhā ṭhapitā.
atk-s0301a:1405_20: Caturo ca mahantāti cattāro mahārājāno vuttā.
atk-s0301a:1405_22: Tasmā yadi asurā kupitāvilacittā devapuraṃ upayanti yuddhesū,
atk-s0301a:1405_24: taṃ uragā paṭibāhanti evaṃ sesesu sesā.
atk-s0301a:1406_1: Tasmā antarā attānaṃ ajānitvā pāṭaliyā pupphitāya,
atk-s0301a:1406_7: gacchāma tena saddhiṃ yujjhissāmā”ti hatthiassarathe āruyha suvaṇṇarajatamaṇiphalakāni gahetvā,
atk-s0301a:1406_9: asurabheriyo vādentā mahāsamudde udakaṃ dvidhā bhetvā uṭṭhahanti.
atk-s0301a:1406_10: Te deve vuṭṭhe vammikamakkhikā vammikaṃ viya sineruṃ abhiruhitu ārabhanti.
atk-s0301a:1406_11: Atha nesaṃ paṭhamaṃ nāgehi saddhiṃ yuddhaṃ hoti.
atk-s0301a:1406_12: Tasmiṃ kho pana yuddhe na kassaci chavi vā cammaṃ vā chijjati,
atk-s0301a:1406_14: kevalaṃ kumārakānaṃ dārumeṇḍakayuddhaṃ viya aññamaññaṃ santāsanamattameva hoti.
atk-s0301a:1406_15: Koṭisatāpi koṭisahassāpi nāgā tehi saddhiṃ yujjhitvā te asurapuraṃyeva pavesetvā nivattanti.
atk-s0301a:1407_1: atha nāgā osakkitvā dutiye ālinde supaṇṇehi saddhiṃ ekatova hutvā yujjhanti.
atk-s0301a:1407_3: Yadā pana tāni pañcapi ṭhānāni asurā maddanti,
atk-s0301a:1407_4: tadā ekato sampiṇḍitānipi pañca balāni osakkanti.
atk-s0301a:1407_5: Atha cattāro mahārājāno gantvā sakkassa taṃ pavattiṃ ārocenti.
atk-s0301a:1407_6: Sakko tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā diyaḍḍhayojanasatikaṃ vejayantarathaṃ āruyha sayaṃ vā nikkhamati,
atk-s0301a:1408_0: Evaṃ bhaddantavāti khoti evaṃ hotu bhaddaṃ tava iti kho.
atk-s0301a:1408_2: Accharāsaṅghaparivuto saṭṭhiyojanaṃ vitthārena suvaṇṇamahāvīthiṃ otaritvā nakkhattaṃ kīḷanto nandanavanādīsu vicaratīti attho.
atk-s0301a:1409_3: Na ca kiccāni kārayeti kiñci kiccaṃ nāma na kareyya.
atk-s0301a:1409_4: Sabbakāmasamiddhassāti sabbakāmehi samiddho assa. Taṃ me, sakka,
atk-s0301a:1409_7: taṃ me varaṃ uttamaṃ ṭhānaṃ okāsaṃ disaṃ ācikkha kathehīti vadati.
atk-s0301a:1409_8: Nibbānassa hi so maggoti kammaṃ akatvā jīvitaṭṭhānaṃ nāma nibbānassa maggo. Paṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1411_0: 248. Dutiye susīmanti attano puttasahassassa antare evaṃnāmakaṃ ekaṃ puttameva. Dutiyaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1413_2: Dhajaggaṃ ullokeyyathāti sakkassa kira diyaḍḍhayojanasatāyāmo ratho.
atk-s0301a:1413_6: Tadeva pamāṇaṃ diguṇaṃ katvā tiyojanasatāyāmotipi vadantiyeva.
atk-s0301a:1413_14: Taṃ passantānañhi rājā no āgantvā parisapariyante nikhātathambho viya ṭhito,
atk-s0301a:1413_15: kassa mayaṃ bhāyāmāti bhayaṃ na hoti.
atk-s0301a:1413_16: Pajāpatissāti so kira sakkena samānavaṇṇo samānāyuko dutiyaṃ āsanaṃ labhati.
atk-s0301a:1413_20: Palāyīti asurehi parājito tasmiṃ rathe ṭhito appamattakampi rajadhajaṃ disvā palāyanadhammo.
atk-s0301a:1414_1: Idamavocāti idaṃ dhajaggaparittaṃ nāma bhagavā avoca,
atk-s0301a:1414_3: Idaṃ āvajjetvā hi yakkhabhayacorabhayādīhi dukkhehi muttānaṃ anto natthi.
atk-s0301a:1414_5: idaṃ āvajjamāno hi pasannacitto ākāsepi patiṭṭhaṃ labhati.
atk-s0301a:1415_1: dīghavāpicetiyamhi kira sudhākamme kayiramāne eko daharo muddhavedikāpādato patitvā cetiyakucchiyā bhassati.
atk-s0301a:1415_4: So maraṇabhayena tajjito “dhajaggaparittaṃ maṃ rakkhatū”ti āha.
atk-s0301a:1415_5: Tāvadevassa cetiyakucchito dve iṭṭhakā nikkhamitvā sopānaṃ hutvā aṭṭhaṃsu,
atk-s0301a:1415_7: Tasmiṃ nisseṇiyaṃ ṭhite iṭṭhakā yathāṭṭhāneyeva aṭṭhaṃsu. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1417_1: Catutthe vepacittīti so kira asurānaṃ sabbajeṭṭhako.
atk-s0301a:1417_3: Kaṇṭhapañcamehīti dvīsu hatthesu pādesu kaṇṭhe cāti evaṃ pañcahi bandhanehi.
atk-s0301a:1417_4: Tāni pana naḷinasuttaṃ viya makkaṭakasuttaṃ viya ca cakkhussāpāthaṃ āgacchanti,
atk-s0301a:1417_8: Akkosatīti corosi bālosi mūḷhosi thenosi oṭṭhosi goṇosi gadrabhosi nerayikosi tiracchānagatosi,
atk-s0301a:1417_10: duggatiyeva tuyhaṃ pāṭikaṅkhāti imehi dasahi akkosavatthūhi akkosati.
atk-s0301a:1417_15: tadā tampi evaṃ bandhitvā asurabhavanassa dvāre nipajjāpetvā pothāpessāmīti ādīni vatvā tajjeti.
atk-s0301a:1417_16: Sakko vijitavijayo na taṃ manasi karoti,
atk-s0301a:1417_17: mahāpaṭiggahaṇaṃ panassa matthake vidhunanto sudhammadevasabhaṃ pavisati ceva nikkhamati ca.
atk-s0301a:1417_18: Ajjhabhāsīti “kiṃ nu kho esa sakko imāni pharusavacanāni bhayena titikkhati,
atk-s0301a:1418_5: Yo sato upasammatīti yo satimā hutvā upasammati,
atk-s0301a:1418_6: tassa upasamaṃyevāhaṃ bālassa paṭisedhanaṃ maññeti attho.
atk-s0301a:1418_7: Yadā naṃ maññatīti yasmā taṃ maññati.
atk-s0301a:1418_9: Gova bhiyyo palāyinanti yathā goyuddhe tāvadeva dve gāvo yujjhante gogaṇo olokento tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0301a:1418_11: atha naṃ palāyantaṃ sabbo gogaṇo bhiyyo ajjhottharati.
atk-s0301a:1418_12: Evaṃ dummedho khamantaṃ bhiyyo ajjhottharatīti attho.
atk-s0301a:1419_1: Khantyā bhiyyo na vijjatīti tesu sakaatthaparamesu atthesu khantito uttaritaro añño attho na vijjati.
atk-s0301a:1419_2: Tamāhu paramaṃ khantinti yo balavā titikkhati,
atk-s0301a:1419_6: abalameva taṃ balanti āhu kathentīti dīpeti.
atk-s0301a:1419_11: dhammaṭṭhaṃ pana cāletuṃ samattho nāma natthi.
atk-s0301a:1419_12: Tasseva tena pāpiyoti tena kodhena tasseva puggalassa pāpaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1419_17: Janā maññantīti evarūpaṃ attano ca parassa cāti ubhinnaṃ atthaṃ tikicchantaṃ nipphādentaṃ puggalaṃ “andhabālo
atk-s0301a:1421_1: Pañcame asurindaṃ etadavocāti chekatāya etaṃ avoca.
atk-s0301a:1421_2: Evaṃ kirassa ahosi “parassa nāma gāhaṃ mocetvā paṭhamaṃ vattuṃ garu.
atk-s0301a:1421_3: Parassa vacanaṃ anugantvā pana pacchā sukhaṃ vattu”nti.
atk-s0301a:1421_7: daṇḍaṃ vā satthaṃ vā gahetabbanti evamettha natthīti attho. Pañcamaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1423_1: Chaṭṭhe ajjhabhāsīti tassa kira simbalivanābhimukhassa jātassa rathasaddo ca ājānīyasaddo dhajasaddo ca samantā asanipātasaddo viya ahosi.
atk-s0301a:1423_3: jarājiṇṇā ceva rogadubbalā ca asañjātapakkhapotakā ca palāyituṃ asakkontā,
atk-s0301a:1423_13: So hi ratho puññapaccayanibbatto cakkavāḷapabbatepi sinerumhipi sammukhībhūte vinivijjhitvāva gacchati na sajjati,
atk-s0301a:1423_16: yathā mahāsakaṭe kadalivanamajjhena vā eraṇḍavanamajjhena vā gacchante sabbavanaṃ vibhaggaṃ nimmathitaṃ hoti,
atk-s0301a:1425_1: Sattame upasaṅkamīti “ayaṃ sakko ‘yopi me assa supaccatthiko,
atk-s0301a:1425_5: kiṃ nu kho maṃ passitvā dubbhati,
atk-s0301a:1425_10: Saha vacanenevassa so kaṇṭhapañcamehi bandhanehi baddhova ahosi.
atk-s0301a:1425_11: Sapassu ca meti mayi adubbhatthāya sapathaṃ karohīti vadati.
atk-s0301a:1425_12: Yaṃ musābhaṇato pāpanti imasmiṃ kappe paṭhamakappikesu cetiyarañño pāpaṃ sandhāyāha.
atk-s0301a:1425_14: Mittadduno ca yaṃ pāpanti mahākapijātake mahāsatte duṭṭhacittassa pāpaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1425_16: Imāni kira imasmiṃ kappe cattāri mahāpāpāni. Sattamaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1427_6: Tattha khantyā bhiyyoti nipphannasobhanesu atthesu khantito uttaritaro attho nāma natthi.
atk-s0301a:1427_8: Soṇasiṅgālādayopi hi upādāya akiccajāto satto nāma natthi.
atk-s0301a:1427_11: sambhogā sabbapāṇinanti pārivāsikaodanādīni hi asambhogārahāni honti,
atk-s0301a:1427_12: tāni puna uṇhāpetvā bhajjitvā sappimadhuphāṇitādīhi saṃyojitāni sambhogārahāni honti.
atk-s0301a:1427_15: Nipphannasobhano atthoti ime atthā nāma nipphannāva sobhanti.
atk-s0301a:1429_1: Navame paṇṇakuṭīsu sammantīti himavantapadese ramaṇīye araññāyatane rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānacaṅkamanādīhi sampannāsu paṇṇasālāsu vasanti.
atk-s0301a:1429_2: Sakko ca devānamindo vepacitti cāti ime dve janā jāmātikasasurā kālena kalahaṃ karonti,
atk-s0301a:1429_12: Na hettha devāti etasmiṃ sīlavantānaṃ gandhe devā na paṭikkūlasaññino,
atk-s0301a:1431_1: Dasame samuddatīre paṇṇakuṭīsūti cakkavāḷamahāsamuddapiṭṭhiyaṃ rajatapaṭṭavaṇṇe vālukapuḷine vuttappakārāsu paṇṇasālāsu vasanti.
atk-s0301a:1431_7: Te devehi parājitā palāyantā isīnaṃ assamapadena gacchantā “sakko imehi saddhiṃ mantetvā amhe nāseti,
atk-s0301a:1431_8: gaṇhatha puttahatāya putte”ti kupitā assamapade pānīyaghaṭacaṅkamanasālādīni viddhaṃsenti.
atk-s0301a:1431_9: Isayo araññato phalāphalaṃ ādāya āgatā naṃ disvā puna dukkhena paṭipākatikaṃ karonti.
atk-s0301a:1431_11: Tasmā “idāni tesaṃ saṅgāmo paccupaṭṭhito”ti sutvā evaṃ cintayiṃsu.
atk-s0301a:1432_1: Bhayassa abhayassa vāti bhayaṃ vā abhayaṃ vā.
atk-s0301a:1433_0: Tikkhattuṃ ubbijjīti sāyamāsabhattaṃ bhuñjitvā sayanaṃ abhiruyha nipanno niddāya okkantamattāya samantā
atk-s0301a:1433_1: ṭhatvā sattisatena pahaṭo viya viravanto uṭṭhahati,
atk-s0301a:1433_8: Evamassa tato paṭṭhāya gelaññajātaṃ cittaṃ vepati.
atk-s0301a:1433_9: Teneva cassa “vepacittī”ti aparaṃ nāmaṃ udapādīti. Dasamaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1437_4: Kule jeṭṭhāpacāyīti kulajeṭṭhakānaṃ mahāpitā mahāmātā cūḷapitā cūḷamātā mātulo mātulānītiādīnaṃ apacitikārako.
atk-s0301a:1437_11: Dānasaṃvibhāgaratoti dāne ca saṃvibhāge ca rato. Paṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0301a:1439_2: Āvasathaṃ adāsīti catumahāpathe mahājanassa āvasathaṃ kāretvā adāsi.
